Title: 知识图谱/自然语言处理算法工程师, Marketplace - Data Science
Description: Marketplace 数据团队的使命是建立可持续的高效数据产品来促进Shopee的业务发展。团队致力于通过分析大量的用户，促销和物品相关数据，提供更加智能的商业洞察来最大化推广活动的效果，并基于全方位的用户画像为Shopee用户提供优质和个性化的电商体验。   工作职责   构建电商知识图谱，例如SPU库，商品画像，品牌库，品牌画像等。 利用机器学习算法服务选品、商品投放，提高商品转化率 进行信息提取、知识图谱、图计算等算法研究    任职要求   计算机，工程，数学以及相关专业本科及以上学历。 拥有自然语言处理、知识图谱的过往项目经验。 优秀的python， SQL, Spark编程经验。

Title: Data Scientist (OCR) - Deloitte Analytics Institute - Shanghai
Description: Pursue a Career with Impact  At Deloitte China, we are on a mission to nurture and empower our people to become deep subject matter experts. We offer the perfect platform to unleash your full potential and equip you to thrive on challenges, and partner with our clients to solve their most complex problems. A world of opportunities awaits. Start your adventure and journey with us.    About The Business    对技术，商业，金融，感兴趣？你在寻找一个快速、令人兴奋、充满活力的工作环境来挑战你现有的技能吗？你有兴趣使用自然语言技术来解决复杂的业务问题吗？你对自然语言中的技术进步有好奇心吗？你是在寻找一个能将所有这些利益结合起来的职业吗？如果是这样，德勤正在寻找德勤数智研究院的数据科学家。德勤数智研究院是一个卓越的中心，我们的研究成果会在德勤所有的业务线中得到应用，包括：咨询、风险咨询、财务咨询、税务和审计和保证。   我们的客户包括银行、保险、制造业、电信、技术、能源和资源等行业中最大的公司。    Work you'll do    岗位职责：   1 、开发基于文档的 OCR 算法，并将算法应用到各个业务场景中；   2 、跟进 OCR 前沿技术（文档图像预处理，文字检测，文字识 别，版面分析，语义理解），进行技术难点攻关与前瞻研究。    A fit for the role? Let's talk about you.    职位要求：   计算机或数据科学相关专业，本科以上学历， 5 年以上工作经验   2 、有较强的编程能力，熟悉 C++/Python;   3 、熟悉各种图像处理，自然语言处理和机器学习算法；   4 、熟悉常用深度学习框架，对深度学习算法有深刻理解，并有实际项目应用经验；   5 、自我驱动意识强，喜欢创新和挑战，追求卓越；   6 、有 OCR 和文档处理分析相关经验，优先考虑；   7 、在计算机视觉领域发表过高水平的论文，优先考虑。   Why Deloitte China?  Deloitte China delivers a comprehensive range of audit & assurance, consulting, financial advisory, risk advisory and tax services to local, multinational and growth enterprise clients in China.   We are the world's largest professional services firmthat changes the world, we lead with purpose and shared values.  We are the market leader with digital and innovative solutions, we create values for client through our multi-disciplinary services.  We are recognized as Top Employerin China by the Top Employers Institute* for 14th consecutive years, and made the top 3 for the first time this year!  We are certified as one of the ‘Best Workplaces™in Greater China by Great Place to Work® in 2019

Title: Software Engineer - Video Playback 软件开发工程师 - 视频播放体验优化
Description: Disney+ Hotstar is leading the way as the largest and smartest video platform in the country, reaching over 300 million users today. We have set a number of world records along the way - including for the highest concurrent viewership at 25.3 million during the ICC Cricket World Cup 2019. Disney+ Hotstar today is the one-stop destination for all your entertainment needs - from Live Sports, Indian and International Shows and Movies to all Disney content, including Pixar, Marvel, Star Wars, National Geographic and Disney+ Originals. We’re looking for the brightest minds to build the future of TV with us.   We're looking for software developers who are passionate in software engineering and interested in video playback. We want you to be comfortable with working across platforms and programming languages, and can analyze problems from end to end. With the huge user base in India and fast growing international business, this team aimed at building a world class platform to deliver the best watch experience to our global customers, there will be many interesting challenges on the way, come join us!   Responsibility：   Optimize playback performance, including startup time, rebuffers, dropped frames, etc. Research adaptive bitrate(ABR) and bandwidth prediction algorithms, conduct A/B experiments to find best options Design and develop multi CDN traffic director service, select optimum CDN servers based on big data Develop playback QoS metrics platform, support data visualization, A/B experiments, anomaly detection and alerting, etc. Build playback QoS data processing pipeline, analyze performance bottleneck, improve efficiency and reliability    Qualifications：    BS/MS in CS, EE or related major Solid coding, algorithm and data structure skills Familiar with at least one programming language(JavaScript, Golang, Java/Kotlin, Python etc.) Excellent learning and problem solving skills, care about details Responsible and collaborative   Bonus   Knowledge about any of streaming, player or media codec Experience with AWS, K8S, Terraform, Prometheus, etc. Experience with any client development, Android, Web, iOS, LR etc.   职责：   优化用户播放体验，分析并改善启动速度、视频卡顿、丢帧等问题 研究码率自适应，带宽预测等算法，与客户端集成，通过A/B实验选择最优方案 参与多CDN调度服务的设计与开发，基于大数据优化CDN切换 开发播放质量指标平台，支持数据可视化、A/B实验、异常监控等功能 构建大数据实时处理流水线，处理海量播放指标数据，优化吞吐性能，提升可靠性   要求：   计算机、电子等相关专业，本科或以上学历 扎实的代码和算法功底熟悉一门编程语言（JavaScript, Golang, Java/Kotlin, Python等） 优秀的学习能力，解决问题能力，注重细节认真负责，注重团队合作   加分项   对算法复杂度敏感 AWS、K8S、大数据处理、数据库等经验 任一客户端开发经验，Android、Web、iOS、LR等 了解流媒体，播放器，编码之一

Title: Engineer
Description: We offer opportunities for you to expand your engineering or scientific knowledge amidst experts with degrees from top programs at over 500 universities. At Exponent, you will apply your experience, technical skills, and prior academic research to a fulfilling career in consulting. You will have the opportunity to develop continuously through formal and informal development programs, coaching and mentoring, and involvement in a wide array of projects. We are excited about your interest in joining our growing team!   Key statistics:   1100+ Team members 900+ Consultants 550+ Ph.D.s 30+ Offices globally    We are currently seeking an Engineer  for our   You will be responsible for:   Developing test plans, instrumenting, and carrying out laboratory experiments including testing on batteries and battery systems across multiple business sectors Performing engineering calculations and analysis Preparing proposals and technical reports, and presenting findings to clients Traveling with senior staff to client sites Analyzing the failure of a wide variety of products via field inspections, laboratory testing, and engineering analysis Providing failure prevention services Project management and marketing Communicating with clients in the U.S. and Asia    You will have the following skills and qualifications:   Written and verbal fluency in English is required, and verbal fluency in Mandarin Chinese is preferred Ph.D. in Chemical, Mechanical, Aerospace, or Fire Protection Engineering Excellent hands-on engineering experience with strong skills in laboratory methods including construction of experimental apparatus, instrumentation, data acquisition, and data analysis Strong technical background in the thermal sciences and including battery systems, vent gas and fire propagation, fluid mechanics, and heat transfer Experience with battery systems is a plus Demonstrated leadership skills and proven ability to work in a multidisciplinary environment Ability to clearly communicate findings through reports and presentations Must be detail-oriented and self-motivated requiring minimal supervision Strong organizational, teamwork, and management skills    To learn more about life at Exponent and our impact, please visit the following links:   We value and encourage diversity, equity and inclusion across all facets of our firm. Having a team built of people with different backgrounds, skills and perspectives allows us to provide better value to our clients and enjoy an enriched work environment.   Our firm is committed to offering a variety of programs and resources to support health and well-being. We believe that providing competitive benefits as well as compensation and recognition programs empowers our staff to do work that makes a difference. Title: Data Scientist数据科学家
Description: At Bayer we’re visionaries, driven to solve the world’s toughest challenges and striving for a world where ,Health for all, Hunger for none’ is no longer a dream, but a real possibility. We’re doing it with energy, curiosity and sheer dedication, always learning from unique perspectives of those around us, expanding our thinking, growing our capabilities and redefining ‘impossible’. There are so many reasons to join us. If you’re hungry to build a varied and meaningful career in a community of brilliant and diverse minds to make a real difference, there’s only one choice.  Data Scientist数据科学家   Your Tasks And Responsibilities    Working with software and hardware product team to identify use case and further translate into data insights Performing statistical analysis, computer programming, predictive/computer vision modeling, and experimental design to meet product/venture objectives Working reproducibly by documenting, organizing, and curating data and code Analyzing and assessing the quality of data and provide QA/QC solutions Collaborating with data engineers to streamline data source, data cleansing/visualization/analysis, relational data base, and ELT process Acting as a data champion/evangelist within the organization to promote data science/AI based business innovation, operational enhancement, and strategic decision making Managing external data science partners/vendors, building cross-functional relationships to collaboratively partner with internal business team, and effectively networking within global data science community 与数据工程师合作，探索和分析世界上最独特、最有趣的数据集，其中包括与气候、环境、水果、蔬菜、供应链和消费者相关的结构化和非结构化数据 与软件和硬件产品团队密切合作，确定用例并进一步获得启发以及构建 ML/AI 解决方案 运用统计分析、计算机编程、数据科学、数据可视化和实验设计等技术方式，以满足产品 / 企业目标 分析和评估数据质量并提供 QA/QC 解决方案 作为组织内的数据拥护者 / 传道者，促进基于数据科学 / 人工智能的业务创新、增强运营和战略决策 管理外部数据科学合作伙伴 / 供应商，建立跨职能关系以与内部业务团队合作，并在全球数据科学社区内有效建立关系网    Who You Are    Advanced degree in Computer Science, Math/Statistics, Biosystem, or other related fields 5+ years of experience in researching, developing and/or implementing machine learning solutions Proficiency in data science tools and technology, such as Python, R, MySQL, and cloud-based techniques Strong understanding and skills in advanced analytics and data science models and methodology, such as statistical analysis, algorithm development, artificial intelligence, machine learning, text mining, natural language processing, and optimization Familiar with data models built on both structured and unstructured data (e.g., images) Excellent skills in communication, presentation, and stakeholder collaboration Experience with computer vision modeling is a plus 计算机科学、数学 / 统计学、生物系统或其他相关领域的高级学位 5 年以上研究、开发和 / 或实施机器学习解决方案的经验 精通数据科学工具和技术，例如 Python 、 R 、 MySQL 和基于云的技术 对高级数据分析和数据科学模型和方法有深刻的理解和扎实的技能，包括统计分析、算法开发、人工智能、机器学习、文本挖掘、自然语言处理和优化 熟悉基于结构化和非结构化数据（例如图像）的数据模型 善于沟通、展示，以及与需求方交谈 有计算机视觉建模经验者优先   YOUR APPLICATION  If your background and personal experience fit this profile, please send us your complete application at www.career.bayer.cn If you have any recommendations, please kindly send mail to cnreferral@bayer.com   L ocation:  China : ShangHai : ShangHai   Division:  Crop Science   Reference Code:  513801

Title: Cloud Data Engineer
Description: Job Description    工作职责:   1、负责制定公司信息安全制度、安全配置基线等   2、负责公司信息安全安全事件的跟踪和分析，安全事件应急响应。   3、负责公司IPS、WAF等安全产品管理和维护，以及选型工作。   4、负责信息安全平台建设，系统的漏洞扫描，渗透测试、安全加固等工作。   5、负责信息安全审计、等保等相关监管要求工作   6、参与企业代码安全开发标准的制定、发布及落地工作；   7、有较强的学习能力、沟通及协调能力和服务意识，做事沉稳细致、具有良好的文档编写和语言表达能力；   8、对信息安全问题导致的紧急与突发信息安全事件制定应急预案，并做好预防性措施及定期排查信息隐患；   任职资格:   1、本科及以上学历，5年以上的信息安全工作经验。   2、熟悉安全测试流程及方法，能熟练运用多种漏洞扫描及渗透工具，对业界安全动态保持较高的敏感度；   3、有丰富的安全SDLC经历及团队管理经历；   4、熟悉常见系统、网络、应用攻击技术、防御加固。如包括工具、手工检测SQL注入、XSS、CSRF等OWASP TOP 10、DDoS等；   5、掌握Java或Python，有一定的代码阅读能力及逆向分析经验；   6、具备良好的团队合作精神，责任心强，工作积极主动；具备优秀的问题分析能力、优秀的学习能力及沟通协调能力；   7、有信息安全方面的认证（CISP、CISSP）优先；    Job QualificationsQualifications    工作职责:   1、负责制定公司信息安全制度、安全配置基线等   2、负责公司信息安全安全事件的跟踪和分析，安全事件应急响应。   3、负责公司IPS、WAF等安全产品管理和维护，以及选型工作。   4、负责信息安全平台建设，系统的漏洞扫描，渗透测试、安全加固等工作。   5、负责信息安全审计、等保等相关监管要求工作   6、参与企业代码安全开发标准的制定、发布及落地工作；   7、有较强的学习能力、沟通及协调能力和服务意识，做事沉稳细致、具有良好的文档编写和语言表达能力；   8、对信息安全问题导致的紧急与突发信息安全事件制定应急预案，并做好预防性措施及定期排查信息隐患；   任职资格:   1、本科及以上学历，5年以上的信息安全工作经验。   2、熟悉安全测试流程及方法，能熟练运用多种漏洞扫描及渗透工具，对业界安全动态保持较高的敏感度；   3、有丰富的安全SDLC经历及团队管理经历；   4、熟悉常见系统、网络、应用攻击技术、防御加固。如包括工具、手工检测SQL注入、XSS、CSRF等OWASP TOP 10、DDoS等；   5、掌握Java或Python，有一定的代码阅读能力及逆向分析经验；   6、具备良好的团队合作精神，责任心强，工作积极主动；具备优秀的问题分析能力、优秀的学习能力及沟通协调能力；   7、有信息安全方面的认证（CISP、CISSP）优先；   Job  SOLUTIONS   Primary Location  China-Shanghai-Huang Pu District   Other Locations  China   Schedule  Full-time   Job Posting  Sep 15, 2021, 8:46:37 PM   Unposting Date  Ongoing

Title: Machine Learning Engineer
Description: Job Description    Builds machine learning workflows and infrastructure necessary to productize AI models and sustain them in production. Responsible for preparing data for ML models at scale, building appropriate inference interfaces for ML model consumption, enabling ML Ops for continuous delivery and automation of ML pipelines, and/or building and sustaining AI productization platforms.    Qualifications    The candidate should have following qualificationsExcellent development and debugging skills system level language such as C CProven track record of supporting infrastructure and facility for distributed development independently in over 20 people teamsFast learner in new software domain eg deep learning workloadExcellent written and oral communication skills and be able to clearly communicate technical detail and conceptsOne or more of the following qualifications will add value of candidatesProven experience in development automatic test tools infrastructure or reporting systemSolid knowledge in data base website developmentGood understanding of open source project continuous integration development tools and quality control methodologyProven experience in performance and power analysis in servers and related measurement tool developmentHandson experience on deep learning framework   Inside this Business Group  Intel Architecture, Graphics, and Software (IAGS) brings Intel's technical strategy to life. We have embraced the new reality of competing at a product and solution level—not just a transistor one. We take pride in reshaping the status quo and thinking exponentially to achieve what's never been done before. We've also built a culture of continuous learning and persistent leadership that provides opportunities to practice until perfection and filter ambitious ideas into execution.   Work Model for this Role  This role will require an on-site presence.

Title: Data Scientist
Description: A mobile e-commerce platform that flips traditional shopping on its head|US listed company with attactive package     About Our Client  A mobile e-commerce platform that flips traditional shopping on its head.   Job Description  Apply your expertise in data pipelines to help clean data and present data in an easily consumable way.   Apply your expertise in quantitative analysis, modeling, visualization to see beyond the numbers and understand how our users interact with our core/business products Partner with engineering and operational teams to solve problems and identify trends and opportunities Inform, influence, support, and execute our product decisions and product launches .   The Successful Applicant  5+ years experience doing data related work, including analytics, modeling, or data engineering. Some development experience in at least one scripting language (Python, R) Experience with large data sets and distributed computing (Hive/Hadoop) a plus Ability to initiate and drive projects to completion with minimal guidance   Have good business sense. Title: Automation Engineer
Description: Job Ad  Do you want to rethink your impact, and are you passionate about automation? Then you might be our new Automation Engineer .   What if you could work for a cause, not just a company?  Novozymes is the global market leader in biological solutions. We help build better lives. Together with our customers, partners and the global community, we use our innovative thinking and passion for science to boost industries and make everyday products more sustainable for the good of the planet. As the world’s leading provider of industrial enzymes and microorganisms, our bio-innovation enables higher agricultural yields, low-temperature washing, energy-efficient production, renewable fuel and many, many other biological solutions that the world can benefit from today and in the future. We call it Rethink Tomorrow  .   Join us as our new automation engineer  Welcome joins us as our new automation engineer. Repair and Maintenance department is essential to production and site. We secure right product quality and quantity to be supplied to local and global customers by realizing equipment reliability, agile trouble shooting, effective RCA and data analysis.   In this role you’ll make an impact by:   Be responsible of PLC, PI and PCS (process control system) to assure a high level of reliability, troubleshooting and optimization. Be responsible for coordinating and managing external suppliers and contractors on all automation systems. Be compliance with QES requirements, and global and local standards for PLC, PI and PCS. Work with team to support tasks related to automation for both TEDA and Hongda maintenance. Be involved and support on projects as UM/member with regards to reviews and handover. Be local representative in Novozymes global automation network and involve in NZ automation technical development. Develop tools/proposals for TEDA operation automation improvement.    To succeed you must hold:   Bachelor’s degree or above in Automation Engineering or Computer Science with a minimum of 3-5 years related automation background with PLC or/and PI knowledge and experiences. Familiarity with PLC, Microsoft windows7 operating systems, VMware and network communications will be preferred. Self-driven and strong learning skills. Be good at communication ability and coordination skills both locally and globally. Be fluent in Chinese and English in both verbal and written.  Location:  This job will be located at TEDA, Tianjin  Are you passionate about making a sustainable impact, and do you see yourself in this position? Then unlock your passion and apply today!   Application deadline:  31 st July 2022  Contact details: JUIZ@Novozymes.com ; XLY@Novozymes.com  Novozymes is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an equal opportunity and affirmative action employer. All employment decisions are based on business needs without regard to race, color, ethnicity, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, age, disability or veteran status.   Not the right fit for you?  If this job for some reason is not the right fit for you, perhaps you know someone who might find it interesting? If so, please feel free to share the job link and encourage him or her to apply. Thank you for your referral. Please check out our other open positions . Maybe the right fit for you is just a few clicks away.   Want to learn more?  At Novozymes, we invite you to join us in finding biological solutions to the world’s problems. Being a pioneering company, we seek people, who are eager to try new things, motivated by challenge and not afraid to fail but driven to try again. And again. Original thinking happens when we’re given the flexibility to focus and the freedom to fully unfold our individual strengths. This is key to our innovation power and how we have become one of the top patent holders in the biotech industry. Learn more about Novozymes, our purpose, and your career opportunities at novozymes.com.   Reference no.  10059BR   Location  Tianjin   Country  China   Job area  Production   Removal time  midnight Central European Time (CET) / 6pm Eastern Standard Time (EST)   Follow us on  Novozymes.com , LinkedIn and Instagram .   08-Aug-2022

Title: Applications Engineer, China
Description: Job Title    Applications Engineer, China    Job Description    This position has responsibility for product qualification and support in China. This role defines product requirements to meet customer requirements and establishes analytical techniques to measure product performance and lifetime. This individual is responsible for generating and collecting performance data from in-house labs and customer sites and helping develop innovative solutions. This individual defines procedures for manufacturing product including customer requirements. This person works with customers to define requirements and qualification plans, and to resolve performance issues. This individual will go on-site to customers’ factories to assist with qualifications and to address performance issues.    Customer Interface Responsibilities    Providing on-site technical support for ITS’s application solution selling and be capable to discuss all ITS-related technologies.   Troubleshooting of customers’ application issues where ITS’s products are used. Provide assigned sales and business information to ITS for each customer on an ongoing basis.   Responsible for developing and maintaining strong business relationships with key customer contacts. Maintain frequent contact with key functional organizations at each customer site that influence the use, application, or commitment to ITS products and services. Ability to communicate with key customer contacts to understand unmet needs.   Ensure ITS is properly positioned to maintain existing business, to gain competitive business and to secure next generation (expansion) opportunities.   Gather and report information to internal team members on competitor’s products, process results, and progress through established relationships at the customers. Assess competitive risks both from a technical and business perspective and take necessary action to address.   Ability to develop effective technical presentations that position and promote the product as defined in the business strategy.    Experience Required    The successful candidate will have at least 5 years’ experience working on Front End and/or Test semiconductor equipment in a semiconductor manufacturing environment; including installation, maintenance, and troubleshooting. Experience with wafer test and/or package test equipment and with CAD is preferred. The candidate should understand semiconductor clean room procedures and have a track record of successfully managing technical programs at semiconductor manufacturing facilities and working independently to achieve objectives. The candidate should be familiar with the analysis of data from wafer test equipment or socket test equipment.    Education Required    BS in Material Science, Electrical Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Chemical Engineering or related field as minimum. Advanced degree is desirable.

Title: Machine Learning Engineer
Description: Full-time    Responsibilities    Build, maintain, and improve efficient and reliable data mining and machine learning models. Design, implement and tune machine learning models, and provide performance feedback. Work closely with data engineers to adapt and improve data pipelines for production models. Work closely with software engineers in putting models into production (interface, SLA, scalability).Qualifications Strong academic background required. MS in Computer Science or Machine Learning with 2+ years of industry experience or PhD in related field with 1+ years of industry experience required. Expert in Python, and computation graph toolkits (e.g., Scikit-learn, Tensorflow). Solid experience with Python packages such as Numpy, Panda, and Scikit-learn. Expert/Master in common families of machine learning models, feature engineering, feature selection techniques, and tuning of machine learning models. Master with SQL or other relational database. Master in building and productionizing end-to-end machine learning systems. Knowledge and experience in cloud computing is a plus. Extensive data modeling and data architecture skills. Advanced math skills (linear algebra, Bayesian statistics, group theory). Ability to consistently exercise independent discretion and judgment on significant matters. Strong analytical, problem-solving and communication skills. Ability to work in a team environment

Title: Reporting Analyst
Description: We are looking for a talented data analyst to join us! As our Media Analyst you will apply your analytical mind to provide our clients with key insights into their brand perception, media performance, competitor landscape, campaign performance, industry/consumer insights reports.   Our Media Analysts are part of the Delivery Services team and they are responsible for curating bespoke reports and managing key projects for our biggest clients. We deliver business-essential intelligence reports based on our keen analyses of various media outlets across traditional and social media channels.   At Meltwater, our core competency of adaptability to client’s requirements and quick delivery comes from the unique team of individuals composed of diverse insights & analytical skill sets. We always strive to break new ground, constantly focusing on solution-oriented approaches and at the same time supporting each individual to develop their full potential.   This role is based in Shanghai and will report directly to the Analyst Manager, APAC.    What You'll Do    Analyse mainstream media and social media content to draw meaningful insights which help with furthering our clients' strategic communications goals Conduct quantitative and qualitative media data analysis Manage your portfolio of monthly/quarterly projects and ensure customer satisfaction throughout the delivery process Utilise our award-winning Meltwater solutions, Microsoft Excel and PowerPoint extensively, to cover end-to-end process of extracting raw data, uncovering insights, and delivering reports in a digestible format to clients Play an integral role of working cohesively with your team to ensure all deliverables and tasks are completed in good quality and well within deadlines Brainstorm and strategise ways to evolve & improve report quality and objectives, catering to clients’ changing requirements or feedback Work closely and interdependently with your internal team, enterprise clients and Account Managers with a shared purpose of value-adding to clients    Who You Are    Attained Bachelor's Degree or relevant previous work experience Entry and graduate level / 0-1 years of relevant work experience (experience in a Client facing roles an advantage) Proficient in using Microsoft Excel, pivot tables, Vlookup and Powerpoint Excellent report writing skills, with experience in both qualitative and quantitative reporting Able to think critically – look at numbers, trends, and data and come to conclusions based on the findings Excellent communication and presentation skills, both written and verbal Must be a team player Keen interest in current affairs, mainstream media and social media Strong customer focus Meticulous – have an eye for detail, ensure data integrity & precision, and exercise vigilance in the analysis to come to correct conclusions Must be comfortable working independently Experience with data visualisation tools such as Tableau, Power BI, Google Studio (preferred)    What We Offer    Empowerment in your role Flat hierarchy with diverse, high-performance & collaborative teams Global presence & a uniquely Meltwater culture like no other 20 paid holidays Paid sick leave Annual physical examination Gym membership Holiday benefits Free drinks and snack in the office Fun, ambitious and international working environment Various learning and development opportunities eg. oversea conference, skills development training, online training, expert sharing session, business cases sharing session Regular company subsidized cultural events eg. team dinner, drinks, offsite events, health and wellness class in office, closing day celebration And more...

Title: Data Modeler
Description: Company Description    Discover the Unexpected  Experian is the world’s leading global information services company. We are listed on the London Stock Exchange (EXPN) and are a constituent of the FTSE 100 Index. We’re passionate about unlocking the power of data in order to transform lives and create opportunities for consumers, businesses and society. For more than 125 years, we’ve helped businesses grow, consumers and small businesses gain access to financial services, and economies and communities flourish – and we’re not done.   Our 18k amazing employees in 40+ countries believe the possibilities for you, and the world, are growing. We’re investing in the future, through new technologies, talented people and innovation so we can help create a better tomorrow.   To do this we employ the greatest and brightest minds that share our purpose and want to make a difference. Experian Asia Pacific's culture, people and environments are key differentiators. We focus on what truly matters; diversity and inclusion, work/life balance, flexible working, development, equity, engagement, collaboration, wellness, reward & recognition, volunteering... the list goes on. We’re committed to fostering a strong sense of belonging and a place where you can bring your true self to work.   We’re an award winning organisation due to our strong people first focus. This includes Top Employer™ and Great Place To Work™ accreditations.   Learn more at www.experianplc.com    Job Description    The role sits within our Decision Analytics, one of our four Global Business Lines.   Experian Decision Analytics helps client achieve and sustain significant growth. We do this by enabling clients to make analytics-based customer decisions that support their strategic goals. As experts in uniting business understanding with consumer and business information, analytics and strategy execution, we empower clients to optimize customer value and actively manage it over time. This role therefore has clear accountability for creating measurable value within our client organizations.    What You’ll Be Doing    Deliver customized solutions across the customer lifecycle for financial institutions. This includes but not limited to the development of customer management scorecards of application, behavioural and collection risk scorecards, Basel III PD, CCF and LGD models, customer life cycle strategies of approval, limit, price and early warning. Activity participant in model development project from an end-to-end perspective including formulating the data extraction requirements, data cleaning, credit risk model development, model validation, implementation testing and performance monitoring Analyze data to extract risk analytics patterns, identify emerging trends, and present detailed metrics of overall risk management solution effectiveness. Conduct R&D with the aim of creating custom analytics solution and tackling technical issues. Create reporting and documents in Chinese or English based on analysis Be able to communicate and present to clients effectively, manage client's expectation and enhance relationship with clients.    More About You    Qualifications   Preferably approx 2 years’ experience in financial institutions or analytical/consultancy areas, we will also consider early career applicants Familiar with at least 1 basic analytics tools: SAS, R, Python Bachelor’s degree major in statistical, financial engineer, finance or mathematical elements Experience in credit risk modelling of scorecard development, Basel III or IFRS 9 is preferred Sound Knowledge in Data Analytics of traditional Regression and Machine Learning technique Fluency in Mandarin and business/basic level English (to attend regional training sessions etc) Willing to travel    Additional Information    All your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines.   Experian Careers - Creating a better tomorrow together   Find out what its like to work for Experian by clicking here

Requirements:   Must have one or more of the following types of hardware and specific device models to be used for video captures:      Mirrorless/ DSLR cameras   Sony rx100 V OR Sony ZV-1 | Capture format: LOG, HLG Sony A7S III | Capture format: Log (S-Log3-Cine), HLG Canon EOS R5 | Capture format: Log (Canon-log-3), HDR PQ (All I) Panasonic GH5S | Capture format: Log (Panasonic vlog), HLG internal, ProRes HQ (with Atomos Ninja 5) Fujifilm X-T3 or X-T4 | Capture format: Log (F-Log), HLG Nikon Z6 or Z7 | Capture format: Log (N-Log) & ProRes Raw (with Atomos Ninja 5)     Action cameras   DJI OSMO Action 4K or DJI Pocket 2 | Capture format: HDR GoPro HERO8 Black | Capture format: HEVC (H. 265), standard H. 264 (AVC)     Drones   Any DJI model | Capture format: 4K HDR     Atomos recorder   Any model | Capture format: ProResRAW     Apple   iPhone X OR iPhone 11 Or iPad Air | Capture format: SD iPhone 12 | Capture format: HDR iPad Pro (2021) | Capture format: HDR       If you are interested in this opportunity, kindly click this link to apply:https://connect.appen.com/qrp/public/jobs?sref=1e2cd426f7cf69713edde5dca9f05964    Then choose Chinaas your country of residence and Englishas your primary language, then input your language region. Once your account has been created, click the 'All Projects' Tab and look for this project.     Here is the step on how to create a profile in Appen Connect:https://crowdsupport.appen.com/hc/en-us/articles/4408022443156-How-do-I-create-a-profile-in-Appen-Connect-VIDEO       Please do let me know if you have any questions or clarifications regarding the project, you can email me at rsolis@appen.com or message me on WeChat: AppenRSolis    "A diverse, inclusive culture is vital to our mission of helping build better AI. We offer opportunities for individuals of all abilities and backgrounds."     Thank you and we hope to work with you soon!

Title: Google Data Analyst
Description: We are on a mission to make science open so everyone can live healthy lives on a healthy planet  Who We Are  Frontiers is an award-winning open science platform and leading open access scholarly publisher.   We are one of the largest and most cited publishers globally. To date, our 200,000 freely available research articles have received more than 1 billion views and downloads and 2 million citations. Our journals span science, health, humanities and social sciences, engineering, and sustainability. And we continue to expand into new academic disciplines so more researchers can publish open access.   Be part of the publishing revolution and help us transform the way research is published, evaluated, and communicated to the world.   The Role:  We are expanding our Digital Marketing Team and recruiting a Google Data Analyst ; this is a brand new role in the team reporting the SEO Manager. The Google Data Analyst will play a key role in analyzing the results of our SEO efforts and contribute to improving the appearance and positioning of our webpages on search engine results pages.   Key Responsibilities:   Monitor and analyze SEO Signals, website UX, traffic and engagement as well as website ranking and content consumption Build reports and provide recommendations on actions to take where necessary; implement automated escalation systems Support other teams in their project planning to ensure that robust and efficient tracking and analytics systems are implemented Consolidate Google Analytics and Google Search Console data with Frontiers Data Warehouse (DWH) and other data sources Provide expert recommendation on the use of GA360 data    Knowledge, Skills & Experience:   Education: Bachelor’s degree in Computer science, Mathematics, Marketing or any other relevant field, with strong interest in data analysis Desirable 3+ years of experience working directly with Google Analytics data Proven ability to manage, understand, discuss, and work with analytics accounts, goals, properties, dashboards, reports, segments, and custom channel/content groupings Experience working with Google Search console and Big query Hands-on experience with Google Tag Manager; experience and expertise in web tagging concepts Experience in using visualization tools, in particular Tableau and Google Data Studio An understanding of SEO and technical SEO concepts, search data Entrepreneurial ability to diagnose web data tracking issues and propose solutions Interest in statistical programming/query languages (R, Python, SQL) Ability to produce clear and concise data-driven reports and presentations and ability to simplify advanced statistical concepts for a layman audience Desirable: knowledge of GraphQL, Graph DB (for ex neo4j) and Web code (html, css, js)    Benefits  With more than 50 nationalities represented in our global team, you will work regularly with teammates in other countries, and with our community of researchers, editors, and authors from around the globe.   Our mission to create solutions for healthy lives also extends to the working environment we provide for our employees.   This includes:  100% remote working  Employees now have the flexibility to choose where they want to work, with remote working available on a part- or full-time basis (not applicable to some Business Support jobs due to nature of role).   Learning and development  All employees have access to LinkedIn Learning (and Pluralsight for our technology team), an annual personal learning budget, and dedicated L&D time.   Wellbeing  We offer free online yoga classes, an employee assistance plan, access to the Headspace app, and four wellbeing days on top of your annual leave allowance.   Volunteering opportunities  Employees can dedicate three days each year to volunteer for a personal cause or through our volunteering partner platform, Alaya.   Frontiers actively embraces diversity and is a safe and welcoming workplace. Recruitment is free from discrimination – including based on race, national or ethnic origin, age, religion, disability, sex, gender identity or sexual orientation. With over 600 employees from more than 50 different nations, our diversity creates vibrant teams and constantly challenges us to appreciate multiple perspectives.

Title: Data Scientist
Description: About Airwallex    Established in Melbourne in 2015, Airwallex is a global payments fintech transforming the way businesses move and manage money domestically and internationally.   In today’s fast-changing digital era, our purpose is to empower businesses of all sizes to grow in their own markets and around the world, and by doing so, contribute to the global economy. With technology at our core, we built a proprietary global financial infrastructure platform to help businesses transact, collect and pay in any foreign currency across 130+ countries and 50+ currencies, without the constraints of the traditional global financial system.   In just five years since we were founded, Airwallex has grown to become Australia’s fastest-growing fintech unicorn and a well-funded international technology leader backed by world-leading investors. Our leadership, innovation, and scale have been recognized and awarded by leading independent authorities, such as listing in Forbes' Cloud 100 2021 and placing in the Top 50 of KPMG’s Global Fintech100 three years in a row.   To support our ambitious growth plans, we’re looking to expand our global teams with smart, driven, and passionate individuals who are excited about joining our rocketship and taking on the challenge of a lifetime.    Responsibilities    The role is in Global Data Strategy&Analytics team   Define, understand, and test opportunities and levers to improve the product, and drive roadmaps through your insights and recommendations. Work with large and complex data sets to solve a wide array of business problems using different analytical and statistical approaches. Apply technical expertise with quantitative analysis, experimentation, data mining, and the presentation of data to develop strategies for our products Identify and measure the success of product efforts through goal setting, forecasting, and monitoring of key product metrics to understand trends. Partner with Product, Engineering, and cross-functional teams to inform, influence, support, and execute product strategy and investment decisions   Qualification   3+ years of industry experience and an advanced degree in a quantitative field Experience with communicating the results of analyses to executives and cross-functional teams to influence the strategy Expert in data querying languages (e.g. SQL), scripting languages (e.g. Python), and/or statistical/mathematical software (e.g. R), experience in schema design and dimensional data modeling a plus Ability to perform statistical analysis to drive data-informed decisions Experience in technology, financial services, and/or a high growth environment is advantageous   At Airwallex you’ll have the ability to make an impact in a rapidly growing, global fintech. You’ll be offered a competitive salary and we also like to ensure we create the best environment for our people by providing collaborative open office space with a fully stocked kitchen. We organize regular team-building events, encourage flexible/remote working, and give our people the freedom to be creative.  Airwallex is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. We value diversity and anyone seeking employment at Airwallex is considered based on merit, qualifications, competence, and talent. We don’t regard color, religion, race, national origin, sexual orientation, ancestry, citizenship, sex, marital or family status, disability, gender, or any other legally protected status. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know.  Airwallex does not accept unsolicited resumes from search firms/recruiters. Airwallex will not pay any fees to search firms/recruiters if a candidate is submitted by a search firm/recruiter unless an agreement has been entered into with respect to the specific open position(s). Search firms/recruiters submitting resumes to Airwallex on an unsolicited basis shall be deemed to accept this condition, regardless of any other provision to the contrary.

Title: QA Engineer
Description: Job Description:    Life at Grab    At Grab, every Grabber is guided by The Grab Way, which spells out our mission, how we believe we can achieve it, and our operating principles - the 4Hs: Heart, Hunger, Honour and Humility. These principles guide and help us make decisions as we work to create economic empowerment for the people of Southeast Asia.   Get to know the team:  The Deliveries-Meads-QA-Platforms team is a core QA team responsible for the quality assurance of Deliveries platform. We make an impact by quick deliver with high quality leverage on automation testing. If you are looking for use automation for diversified complex product testing opportunity, then you should join our team!   Get to know the role:  We are looking for a QA Engineer for platform level product testing. We believe a successful candidate has 3+ years’ experience as QA engineer / Automation Engineer or Software Development Engineer in Test and familiar with one of the test scripts Python/Golang/Java experiment for product automation, but if you believe you have what it takes then we’d love to hear from you either way. This role is required because we are supporting the critical path and continually growing business. In return, you will get an opportunity to work with a creative team and help Southeast Asia people have a better life.   The Day-to-Day Activities:   Define test plans, test specifications, test suites, test cases as well as proposed tools for functional, security and performance testing in a programmatic manner Understand the product/feature in-depth from the end-user point of view and the underlying implementation. Work closely with the Product Manager, Front End, and Backend developers to understand the feature and the implementation to derive and execute feature tests and impacted feature test cases. Debug failed test cases by analyzing logs and API responses and report bugs with details. Follow-up on bugs to closure. Execute & maintain UI (Web, Mobile app) and API automation suites. Debug and correct script and data issues in automation suites. Understand automation framework and add automation test cases for the new features and regression test cases   The Must-Haves:   Preferably a degree in computer science, software engineering, information technology or related fields 3+ years of experience as QA Engineer/ Automation Engineer or Software Development Engineer in Test Should be able to work efficiently and effectively in a fast-paced dynamic team environment Excellent communication, collaboration and analytical skills in English Perform testing of iOS, Android apps and Backend API’s to ensure that product meets requirements Should have a deeper understanding of the product at the implementation level, should be able to analyze logs and API responses in the Micro-Service integration level. Should have coding experience and hands-on with automation (Web, Mobile app and API automation) Understanding of database concepts and queries (MySQL)   The Nice-to-Haves:   Should have exposure to Agile and weekly sprint and release working models. Knowledge of Tools: Charles, Postman, UI Automation Tools (Selenium, Appium, etc..), Testing Frameworks (Mocha, TestNG, etc.. ), object-oriented programming languages (Java, Golang) or any script languages (Python, Shell)    Our Commitment    We are committed to building diverse teams and creating an inclusive workplace that enables all Grabbers to perform at their best, regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity or sexual orientation and other attributes that make each Grabber unique.   About Grab  Grab is the leading superapp platform in Southeast Asia, providing everyday services that matter to consumers. Today, the Grab app has been downloaded onto millions of mobile devices, giving users access to over 9 million drivers, merchants, and agents. Grab offers a wide range of on-demand services in the region, including mobility, food, package and grocery delivery services, mobile payments, and financial services across 428 cities in eight countries.   Join us today to drive Southeast Asia forward, together.

Title: Data Analyst Engineer-Navigation Database
Description: Job Description Summary   Responsible for designing , developing and testing Embedded Software (Firmware), platforms and systems that control and runs on devices that need to be tailored to the needs of the hardware that it has to control and run on (i.e. directly controls the real time functions of a physical device such as motors, alternators, engines, valves, fans, and other devices and products). Typically requires a deep understanding of the characteristics of the physical device being controlled, the realtime functions it is expected to perform and the ability to design, develop, implement, and test the logic and software required to realize the realtime functionality. Usually tailored for products and services across various P&Ls. Impacts quality of own work and the work of others on the team. Executes standard operational/technical tasks typically subject to instructions and work routines. There is latitude to rearrange the sequence to complete task/duties based on changing work situations.  Job Description   Essential Responsibilities    Work as part of multi-company data service team for the day-to-day production of navigation databases (NDBs), NDB production verification, problem control and reporting, and analysis and completion of corrective action as required by the Lead Navigation Data Analyst Execute quality software applications and analyze the output to determine root cause of any abnormal navigation database change activity Participate on the Data Quality Review Board to present abnormal change activity and determine course of action Actively improve the Navigation Database Production processes and software applications Execute, with guidance from senior engineering resources, the analysis, test, or integration required to define and support assigned systems that meet business standards and product requirements Prepare and present technical data to internal and external customers Document and communicate results of technical data generated Participate on teams assigned to address specific organizational initiatives Share engineering information and promote open dialogue Assure proper documentation of technical data generated for the assigned projects and/or tasks consistent with engineering policies and procedures Participate as a presenter or reviewer in technical and program reviews    Qualifications/Requirements    Bachelor of Science in Engineering, Physics, Mathematics, or Computer Science from an accredited college or university. Minimum 3 years of technical experience in Complex Engineering Systems design and development or relevant research projects. Minimum 1 year of experience in collaborating with customers or suppliers on an engineering development program. Ability and willingness to provide customer support during the core and non-core business hours (24 / 7 / 365) on an as needed basis   Desired Characteristics   Strong technical aptitude, including applicable engineering tools and systems Strong oral and written communication skills Strong interpersonal skills Interdisciplinary communication skills Customer interchange and collaboration skills Ability to engage and build positive relationships with customers and internal & external employees PC proficiency Fluent speaking and writing in English    Additional Information   Relocation Assistance Provided:  No

Title: Data Modeler
Description: Company Description    Discover the Unexpected  Experian is the world’s leading global information services company. We are listed on the London Stock Exchange (EXPN) and are a constituent of the FTSE 100 Index. We’re passionate about unlocking the power of data in order to transform lives and create opportunities for consumers, businesses and society. For more than 125 years, we’ve helped businesses grow, consumers and small businesses gain access to financial services, and economies and communities flourish – and we’re not done.   Our 18k amazing employees in 40+ countries believe the possibilities for you, and the world, are growing. We’re investing in the future, through new technologies, talented people and innovation so we can help create a better tomorrow.   To do this we employ the greatest and brightest minds that share our purpose and want to make a difference. Experian Asia Pacific's culture, people and environments are key differentiators. We focus on what truly matters; diversity and inclusion, work/life balance, flexible working, development, equity, engagement, collaboration, wellness, reward & recognition, volunteering... the list goes on. We’re committed to fostering a strong sense of belonging and a place where you can bring your true self to work.   We’re an award winning organisation due to our strong people first focus. This includes Top Employer™ and Great Place To Work™ accreditations.   Learn more at www.experianplc.com    Job Description    The role sits within our Decision Analytics, one of our four Global Business Lines.   Experian Decision Analytics helps client achieve and sustain significant growth. We do this by enabling clients to make analytics-based customer decisions that support their strategic goals. As experts in uniting business understanding with consumer and business information, analytics and strategy execution, we empower clients to optimize customer value and actively manage it over time. This role therefore has clear accountability for creating measurable value within our client organizations.    What You’ll Be Doing    Deliver customized solutions across the customer lifecycle for financial institutions. This includes but not limited to the development of customer management scorecards of application, behavioural and collection risk scorecards, Basel III PD, CCF and LGD models, customer life cycle strategies of approval, limit, price and early warning. Activity participant in model development project from an end-to-end perspective including formulating the data extraction requirements, data cleaning, credit risk model development, model validation, implementation testing and performance monitoring Analyze data to extract risk analytics patterns, identify emerging trends, and present detailed metrics of overall risk management solution effectiveness. Conduct R&D with the aim of creating custom analytics solution and tackling technical issues. Create reporting and documents in Chinese or English based on analysis Be able to communicate and present to clients effectively, manage client's expectation and enhance relationship with clients.    More About You    Qualifications   Preferably approx 2 years’ experience in financial institutions or analytical/consultancy areas, we will also consider early career applicants Familiar with at least 1 basic analytics tools: SAS, R, Python Bachelor’s degree major in statistical, financial engineer, finance or mathematical elements Experience in credit risk modelling of scorecard development, Basel III or IFRS 9 is preferred Sound Knowledge in Data Analytics of traditional Regression and Machine Learning technique Fluency in Mandarin and business/basic level English (to attend regional training sessions etc) Willing to travel    Additional Information    All your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines.   Experian Careers - Creating a better tomorrow together   Find out what its like to work for Experian by clicking here

Title: Professional, Data Analyst
Description: What this job involves    Day-to-day activities include gathering data and analysis as well as writing reports on major trends in China’s retail, office, and logistics property markets. The analyst will become an expert in the real estate industry in Chengdu and entire West China region covering Chengdu, Chongqing, and other gateway cities. In the process, the analyst will make a considerable contribution to the quality and accuracy of research produced by the firm, tailored consulting projects, and development of a constantly evolving “house view” on property. Ideally such a “house view” will involve cultivating expertise on China’s macroeconomic situation and how it influences local property markets. The analyst also will help the coordinate the production of China-wide reports for JLL’s Real Estate Intelligence Service (REIS), reporting to China central research team.   Use primary and secondary data sources to develop, enhance and leverage understanding of China’s national and city economies, demographics, and commercial real estate markets. Develop expertise in key industries like e-commerce, consumer and retail dynamics, transport infrastructure and distribution networks, shopping mall and warehouse development, etc. Conduct fieldwork, including vacancy and tenant inspections of existing projects as well as assessment of future project completion dates by cultivating local contacts and conducting interviews. Serve as a client facing conduit for JLL research, actively participating in pitches, presentations and projects. Author quarterly research reports and blogs; periodically contribute to themed white papers. Contribute in ongoing efforts at new product development, including Tableau and ArcGIS products Prepare market presentations, client reports, and studies. Coordinate the production of reports by colleagues in Shanghai and across China. Review colleagues’ report drafts for accuracy and quality of analysis. Work with analysts to audit and improve collected quarterly data.     To apply you need to be    A demonstrated interest in (or exposure to) office or retail real estate Fluency in English is required; Research reports are written bilingually in English/Chinese High-level analytical and problem-solving skills, and strategic-thinking capacity Advanced proficiency in Microsoft Excel, experience with Tableau and ArcGIS is a plus. Experienced, polished and innovative presentation skills and high attention to detail Willingness to develop proficiency with new platforms to identify insights through data analytics and mapping Self-motivated, able to work independently and travel independently when required (role is at least 20% travel)     Work experience and Education Credentials    Bachelor’s degree in business, economic, social sciences, or related field preferred; master’s degree a plus China-specific exposure to property investment and/or property-related consulting, urban planning, or other related field is a major plus     JLL Privacy Notice    Jones Lang LaSalle (JLL), together with its subsidiaries and affiliates, is a leading global provider of real estate and investment management services. We take our responsibility to protect the personal information provided to us seriously. Generally the personal information we collect from you are for the purposes of processing in connection with JLL’s recruitment process. We endeavour to keep your personal information secure with appropriate level of security and keep for as long as we need it for legitimate business or legal reasons. We will then delete it safely and securely.   For more information about how JLL processes your personal data, please view our Candidate Privacy Statement.   For additional details please see our career site pages for each country.   For employees in the United States, please see a fully copy of our Equal Employment Opportunity and Affirmative Action policy here.   Jones Lang LaSalle (“JLL”) is an Equal Opportunity Employer and is committed to working with and providing reasonable accommodations to individuals with disabilities. If you need a reasonable accommodation because of a disability for any part of the employment process – including the online application and/or overall selection process – you may email us at AccomodationRequest@am.jll.com. This email is only to request an accommodation. Please direct any other general recruiting inquiries to our Contact Us page > I want to work for JLL.

Title: IT Specialist (contractor)
Description: Let’s Talk About You  Your Profile:    Bachelor for information technology, computer science, software engineering; Master is preferred Familiar with J2EE (JavaBean, struts, hibernate, spring) Familiar with software programing based on Microsoft Relevant Technologies (MS.Net) MVC + SQL Server (Oracle)/C++/C#/JSP...) Familiar with Security vulnerabilities handling from application level Basic Communication Skill with all Stakeholders Fluent in spoken English and writing Team working and collaboration    Your Responsibilities:    Support SE IT CN BE team to make the regular coordination and relevant data collection with local stakeholders and SE IT HQ service owners. Support SE IT CN BE team to prepare the service delivery report and make the basic data analysis with local reporting tool. Develop internal IT applications and supervise the development activities including demand management and external IT vendor management. Assist SE IT CN BE AM team to provide troubleshooting, technical support, and issue handling. Assist SE IT CN BE AM team to provide the regular training for the end user and helpdesk for the using of key IT applications. Support on information security and IT audit activities together with SE IT ITA/ITE team.    Your Opportunities for personal growth:    Join a team of experienced IT technical expert who supports the company's aim to shape the future of the energy market. Our core purpose as IT organization is to deliver IT solutions that provide a competitive advantage to the company. This position provides digital enabling for SE CN Hub in the regional IT applications. You will be adding value through driving business process optimization and working efficiency improvement across multiple IT systems / regions while generating synergies by utilizing different IT technology/solutions and driving process harmonization.    Let’s Talk About Us  "Let’s make tomorrow different today" is our genuine commitment at Siemens Energy to all customers and employees on the way to a sustainable future. Our product portfolio comprises of gas and steam turbines, generators, and gas engines as well as instrumentation and controls and electrical systems.

Title: Data Analyst
Description: Involve in the very important risk transformation project|Stable and globalised platform     About Our Client  Our client is one of the world's largest fintech services organisations.   Job Description  In this position, you will design and implement data solutions to enable data sources to be effectively used for reporting, analysis, modeling, and specific use-cases. Based on these data analysis results, you will raise recommendations and identify improvement opportunities proactively to refine and enhance the analytics enablers and related processess and platforms.   The Successful Applicant   University degree in Computer Science or related field 2+ years of relevant experience, preferably in banking and financial sector Proficiency supporting data and analytics efforts in an innovative environment to support business goals Experience with design and development of datamarts to support AI, machine learning, analytics, and reporting work Proficiency with SQL is required and additional experience with SAS is a strong plus Proficiency with Python and software design is required Open minded and self-motivated with good communication and interpersonal skills as well as strong sense of responsibilits Fluent written and spoken English  What's on Offer   Work in all English environment and has the impart on business Stable and globalised platform   Contact: Cloris Gao  Quote job ref: JN-012022-5239496

Title: Data Analyst - Audit & Assurance - Beijing
Description: Pursue a Career with Impact  At Deloitte China, we are on a mission to nurture and empower our people to become deep subject matter experts. We offer the perfect platform to unleash your full potential and equip you to thrive on challenges, and partner with our clients to solve their most complex problems. A world of opportunities awaits. Start your adventure and journey with us.    About The Business    We help our clients achieve business objectives, accomplish fund raising activities, strengthen management capabilities and minimize enterprise risks through the use of our unique Deloitte Audit risk-based approach. Our clients include major multinational corporations, listed companies and other leading companies in both Hong Kong and Mainland China. Facilitated by our own state of the art technology EMS (Engagement Management System), our professionals who are experienced in both local and international laws / regulations deliver efficient and cost effective audit solutions to our clients.    Work you'll do    Responsible for providing digital advisory services with in-depth technical capabilities using your expertise, including:   Understand and dig deep into the constantly changing business model of various emerging industries. Combine statistical and technical capabilities to discover risk and value from massive data. Assist in Data Analytics projects, such as data due diligence for capital market, regulatory required data assurance, client data analytics and modelling projects. On-field project work and take responsibilities of certain tasks and activities, such as data acquisition, data cleaning, data standardization, tool development, analysis and visualization, etc… Builds trust and credibility with stakeholders, while maintaining independence where required, by seeking to understand their service levels expectations and what matters to them individually. Delivers high quality services by demonstrating a practical awareness of the impact of regulation and risk management in the professional's area of focus. Identifies and contributes to opportunities and is aware of what services can be provided to client base. Contributes to the chosen focus area/s.    A fit for the role? Let's talk about you.    We are looking for someone with:   Bachelor degree or above in Mathematics, Statistics, Computer Science, Software Engineering, Information Security, Electronic and Information Technologies, and other related STEM majors Fluent in one of programming languages, e.g. Python, SQL, R, Java etc… Knowledge and experience in data structure, data analysis and modelling is preferred Strong logical, analytical, problem-solving, and interpersonal skills Aspires to be a professional individual and demonstrated strong interests in our profession Quick learner, problem solver and team player    Why Deloitte China?  Deloitte China delivers a comprehensive range of audit & assurance, consulting, financial advisory, risk advisory and tax services to local, multinational and growth enterprise clients in China.   We are the world's largest professional services firmthat changes the world, we lead with purpose and shared values.  We are the market leader with digital and innovative solutions, we create values for client through our multi-disciplinary services.  We are recognized as Top Employerin China by the Top Employers Institute* for 14th consecutive years, and made the top 3 for the first time this year!  We are certified as one of the ‘Best Workplaces™in Greater China by Great Place to Work® in 2019

Title: Engineering Leadership Development Program
Description: Description    The Role:  Engineering Leadership Development Program (ELDP) is an intense two year program for people who have a passion for technology, a drive for technical excellence, and share Xylem's desire to solve the world’s toughest resource challenges. The program is designed to accelerate professional development through technical and leadership training and a variety of business-critical assignments. If you love technology and want a career in engineering, the Xylem Engineering Leadership Development Program is for you!   The Engineering Leadership Development Program is a two-year program consisting of three rotational assignments which are driven by real business priorities. The program includes Continuous Improvement training, formal presentations to senior leadership, and valuable leadership training. The Rotational assignments are intended to provide a broad exposure to the engineering field leading to successful off program placement.    Essential Duties/Principal Responsibilities    Plan and perform assigned tasks within the framework of program rotation Complete assignment objectives on schedule, within budget, with higher than expected quality while maintaining accuracy and thoroughness Demonstrate ability to understand and apply engineering fundamentals in the business environment Demonstrate analytical / problem solving skills. Propose new analyses, techniques and methodologies with respect to specific area of responsibility where applicable Complete program training and a required green belt project   Minimum Qualifications: Education, Experience, Skills, Abilities, License/Certification:   Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Systems Engineering, Software Engineering, Computer Science, Industrial Engineering, Environmental Engineering, Chemical Engineering, Civil Engineering, Agriculture Engineering or Data Analytics GPA greater than or equal to 3.0/4.0 overall Strong commitment to a career in technology and a passion for engineering Analytical approach to problem solving Ability to lead and work in teams Excellent interpersonal and communication skills Prior internship, co-op or research experience    Physical Demands    (The physical demands described here are representative of those that must be met by an employee to successfully perform the essential functions of this job. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions.)   Regularly required to sit or stand, reach, bend and move about the facility    Work Environment    (The work environment characteristics described here are representative of those an employee encounters while performing the essential functions of this job. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions.)   Office: Standard office equipment; work usually performed in an office setting free from any disagreeable elements.   Standard weekly job hours: 40 hours

Title: Site Inventory Control Engineer
Description: Job Description    F68 IE Site Inventory Control team is mainly responsible for planning and projecting factory wafer output, analyzing fab performance and updating factory key indicators. Additional responsibilities include, but are not limited to: Applying industrial engineering concepts to operations management and capacity analysis; Using statistical analysis to optimize fab performance metrics and audit manufacturing capacity information; Partnering with management to develop applications to improve production metrics; Partnering with TD, process, and equipment engineering to plan for future product introduction; Driving projects to ensure that deliverables are completed within the required timeframe; Communicating data findings and recommending solutions to diverse audiences; Business Plan feed and Partnering with global stakeholders to support supply and demand changes   The position is associated with the sale of the NAND business to SK Hynix aligning to Phase 2 of the transaction. Employees aligned to Phase 2 will continue to be employed by Intel developing NAND technology and components. Phase 2 of the transaction is expected to close in March 2025 at which time employees aligned to this phase of the transaction will transition employment to Solidigm, a stand-alone US subsidiary of SK Hynix headquartered in San Jose, California with offices world-wide. Solidigm is a leading global supplier of NAND flash memory solutions, led by Robert (Rob) B. Crooke as CEO, previously senior vice president and general manager of Intel’s Non-Volatile Memory Solutions Group. To read more, see:  https://www.intc.com/news-events/press-releases/detail/1513/intel-sells-ssd-business-and-dalian-facility-to-sk-hynix   Qualification    Qualifications   Advanced understanding of manufacturing science (scheduling, inventory management, and capacity planning) Advanced data extraction, analysis, and reporting skills Strong ability to communicate and present effectively Proven ability to organize and efficiently facilitate meetings and project teams. Proven ability in multi-tasking projects, time management, organization, and prioritization skills Good English skill, Fast learner, Detail orientation and Strong teamwork.    Education Requirement    Minimum Bachelor or Master degree in Engineering Science. Industrial Engineering, Manufacturing Science is preferred   Inside this Business Group  Employees in Intel's NAND Product Group deliver solutions that are transforming computing across all segments from data centers to Ultrabooks. They invent, develop, bring to market and support customers with leading-edge NAND flash memory and system level solutions such as solid state drives (SSDs). SSDs are accelerating performance for gaming enthusiasts, reducing total cost of ownership for IT managers of data centers and improving security and reliability for businesses. This dynamic group is strategically positioned to become the leading Non-Volatile Memory solution supplier for the compute segment and is a key to expanding markets and continuing the growth for Intel.   Work Model for this Role  This role will require an on-site presence.

Title: Data Scientist 数据科学家
Description: Responsibilities    Major contributor of continuous improvements in the quality of data analysis and modeling in Hotstar Keep track of both industry and academic research trends in related areas including but not limited to machine learning, data science and distributed computation Participate in data science projects planning with product managers and the team based on data-driven investigation methods and industry trends. Propose, implement, test and verify analytic and algorithmic solutions for upcoming data science product features. Implement systems that combine data science and product design to continuously improve over time. Develop prototype, proof of concept, and demo systems to improve performance for current algorithms and architectures. Implement the solutions involved in data science problems. Partner closely with other product teams across the organization to experiment with different algorithms and validate their effectiveness, while gaining knowledge of how DS works in all these products.    Qualifications    Experience: Master degree or above. 1+ year experience of practical algorithm design and implementation in data science related fields. Has experience in backend development will be a plusKnowledge: Solid mathematics,computer science, data analysis andmachine learning background. Solid knowledge and hands-on experiences in big data processing and parallel computing frameworks such as Hadoop and Spark. Problem Solving: Logical thinker with good problem solving and analytical ability to apply your mathematical, algorithmic and other expertise to solve real problems. Learning Ability: Strong ability to master new technology in a short time and apply to solve practical problems. Motivation: Passion for applied research and new technology, open to interdisciplinary work. Collaboration: Participated in at least 1 team project and played an important role to push the projects forward with others. Communication: Good communication skills; both verbal and written.   职责：   作为Hotstar数据分析与建模持续改善的重要贡献者 持续跟踪相关领域的业界和学界的研究动态，不限于数据科学、机器学习和分布式计算 基于数据驱动的调研方法以及业界动态，与产品经理和团队共同参与数据科学项目的规划 搭建系统，将数据科学和产品设计相结合，并持续改进开发原型、POC和演示系统来改善现有算法和架构的性能对数据科学问题中涉及的解决方案进行建模和开发 和其他的产品团队紧密合作，实验不同的算法，验证其有效性   要求：   经验:硕士及以上学历。1年及以上的数据科学相关领域的应用算法设计和开发的实习经验。具有后端开发经验的优先。 知识:扎实的数学、计算机科学、数据分析和机器学习背景。在大数据处理和并行计算框架如Hadoop和Spark方面具有扎实的知识和实操经验 解决问题:具有较好的解决问题和分析能力，将数学、算法和其他技能应用于解决实际问题 学习能力:具有较强的学习能力，能在较短的时间内掌握新的技术并应用于解决实际问题 动机:对应用研穷和新技术有较强的兴趣，并乐干跨领域的工作 协作:参与过至少1个团队的项目，并作为重要角色与他人共同推动项目的进行沟通:较好的口头和文字沟通技能

Title: AIT Simulation Engineer/可靠性仿真工程师_AE
Description: 工作职责:   Technical Development of Assembly and Interconnect Technology (AIT). FE simulation and reliability analysis of new and improved technologies, processes and concepts regarding electrical/mechanical components and interconnects. Simulation support for local and global product development projects and local plant. Method development to further extend simulation capabilities or increase efficiency Support data analytics, data mining and machine learning Cooperation with international development locations (Germany, Hungary, Hongkong, Portugue) and national institutes. 任职条件: -Master in computational engineering, material science, mechanical engineering, electrical engineering, physics or comparable studies. -Internship in industry, project work within studies. -Experience in the field of FE Simulation.(eg.ANSYS) -Enthusiasm for innovative, technical questions and academic work -Structured way of working ad quality mindset -Good communication skills and ability to lead interdisciplinary/international teams -Openness for new solutions and other cultures.
