Title: Data Scientist, Data consulting
Description: Job Description    Data Scientist, Data consulting   Scope:   The DC team is at the intersection between Client Team and the Data Science Team. Together, you will actively work with both stakeholders. Markets : Greater China and possibly some projects in Asia Pacific Region Global/regional/ local: Sub-Regional/Local Purpose of the role: The Data Analyst is responsible for: Being the key contact point between data science and commercial teams, helping commercial team to understand the retail products and the methodology behind it. Supporting the clients’ business needs and driving internal product enhancement at the same time. Analyzing large amounts of data captured by NielsenIQ’s research team to arrive at insights regarding trends as well as opportunities for further study/drilldown. Working hand in hand with the client to explain to them the specific aspects of the studies being undertaken and help the client better understand the data in a more intelligible way through a simple, but effective methodology. Respond to client questions regarding data irregularities and help the client understand the methodology being employed by NielsenIQ’s statistical tools. Create clear insights and examples, either through visualizations or through raw data analysis in order to answer the main question of WHY the data is behaving a certain way. Engage and align with multiple stakeholders on data requirements as well as in design for new studies. Testing new methods, softwares and workflows constantly and checking if they can improve productivity.    Main Accountabilities    Work closely with key account clients to ensure that their data requirements are satisfied and that they are satisfied with NielsenIQ’s retail analysis methodology. Conduct various studies within departments in NielsenIQ for updating, improving and creating new data requirements for the client. Understand client requirements and translate them into intelligent insights by creatively using NielsenIQ’s data. Contribute to creating best practices for the country/ cluster/ region and sharing them with other data departments Improve the product through active inputs and engagement with the Data Science team. Role Requirements (list the critical experience, knowledge, qualifications, skills, and competencies needed to perform this role - over and above standard NielsenIQ leadership and personal effectiveness competencies). Mark each with E=essential, P=preferred. E- Excellent at applying Creative solutions to business problems using data and software. This is key. The candidate must have good business sense to solve problems and decent enough knowledge of analytics to present the findings. P- Experience with facing clients and discussing with them about solutions will be helpful for the role. E- 1-2 years of experience in solving business problems in fields like consumer goods (FMCG), cosmetics or non-perishable items. Experience in consulting or market analysis is a plus. P- Good knowledge of statistical practices such as sampling, projection and statistical modelling to understand trends. P- Bachelor’s degree in Business, Statistics, Operations Research, or Econometrics with outstanding analytical expertise and strong technical leadership E- Proficient in Python or R, as well as Excel as a willingness to learn new softwares constantly. P-Knowledge of Visualization software such as Tableau or Power BI would help. E- Knowledge of SQL or other Database querying tools, and managing large-scale databases is key. P- Fluent Mandarin and good English is essential    Values And Behaviors    ■ Eager to face new technical challenges   ■ Open to changing processes, ways of working, tools, etc.   ■ Conduct root cause analysis and put together prevention plans in case of issues   ■ The person is outgoing. This is important because they must manage several stakeholders at once both internally and externally   ■ Needs to be able to manage the demands of the client and explain to them aspects of the business in a clear way.   ■ Good communication skills and loves to work with the team and socialize with them.   ■ Likes to interact with the team and client even outside of the office.   ■ Analyzes data with integrity and honesty. Does not just do a half-hearted job. Will work till the end to understand everything about the problem and solve it. ■ Is able to say “I don’t know” or “I don’t understand” to his superior so that he/she may improve constantly.   ■ Able to work independently without supervision, and can be trusted to do the work assigned.   ■ Likes to try out new things, not afraid of failure   ■ Is passionate about learning new skills, especially in technology.

Title: Visual Designer
Description: The Opportunity  Airwallex is a global payments FinTech company transforming the way businesses move and manage money globally.   We have built a global financial infrastructure platform to help businesses transact, collect and pay across 130+ countries and 50+ currencies, without the constraints of the traditional global financial system. We've grown to 19 global locations and have raised over $800 million in funding.   To support our ambitious growth plans, we’re looking for smart, collaborative and passionate people who are looking to make a genuine impact.   The Role  Here at Airwallex, we treat design not as an isolated visual exercise but as an integral part of the end to end product experience.   We are after a talented Visual Designer with experience or interest in product design to join our team in Shanghai.   In this hybrid role between visual and product design, you will be a part of the wider product design practice, working directly with our cross-functional teams, including product management, engineering, marketing, sales etc. You will have exposure to global markets and gain a well-rounded skill set as a designer with business acumen and product sense.    Responsibilities    Improve design and presentation of corporate information including sales collateral, factsheets, images, illustrations, infographics to represent corporate data and information in more impactful ways; Design customised graphics for use on our website and sales collateral; Ensure all design standards are on brand and adhering to the overall guidelines; Deliver artifacts that set the standard for design excellence, from ideation to prototypes to validate; Work with other project stakeholders to deliver the information architecture, user story, customer journey map and wireframe flow for new production projects; Actively conduct user interface reviews during engineering development phase to ensure built quality; Regular review of usage data to analyze user behavior and pain points; Participating in key internal meetings including weekly status updates and planning sessions.    Qualifications    Bachelor's degree in Design, Human-Computer Interaction, Computer Science, a related field, or equivalent practical experience. 3 years of experience in product design or visual design. Experience implementing visual design systems across platforms in an iterative software development environment, applying design tools (e.g. Figma, Photoshop, Illustrator, Sketch). A portfolio highlighting multiple projects and your direct contributions.

Key Responsibilities Include   Over the 3 rotations, you will gain experience across core areas including: Best in class cocoa & chocolate product expertise including product development, application, and processing in the lab and factory Skills in project management and communication Technical leadership Oversea assignment for up to six (6) months is required Leadership competencies & personal style Curious about exploring the unknown  Passionate in food application  Persistent in solution-seeking  Entrepreneur in problem-solving  Analytical skills  Team player with good interpersonal skills    About You    Bachelor or Master’s Degree in food science and technology, biology, chemistry, and equivalent subjects Fluent in English Foundation skills in data analysis and business presentation 0 - 2 years of experience in food ingredients, food product development, food marketing, and similar industry. Ability to work independently and handle projects   At Barry Callebaut, we are committed to Diversity & Inclusion. United by our strong values, we thrive on the diversity of who we are, where we come from, what we’ve experienced and how we think. We are committed to nurturing an inclusive environment where people can truly be themselves, grow to their full potential and feel they belong. #oneBC - Diverse People, Sustainable Growth.

Title: DATA ENGINEER - Dubai, UAE
Description: Starting salary of 80,000 - 84,000 USD per annum  in a zero-tax environment.   Job Location:  Dubai, UAE    About Cobblestone    Cobblestone Energy is an independent trading firm. Founded in 2017, we are part of the next generation of companies defining the future of global commodity trading. Although we have experienced very strong growth so far, we are still near the start of our journey. We have ambitions to go a lot further.   Energy in one form or another is fundamental to almost all the world's economic activities. By understanding the demand, supply, and logistics of these commodities, we can better understand the world.   We specialise in the proprietary trading of the short-term wholesale electricity markets across Europe. We make use of advanced data analytics and extensive research to drive profitable decision making, trading enough electricity every day to power a small country and growing every day. Technology and risk management form the backbone of our business.   Over the years we have grown organically. As part of our journey to be the best in all markets we enter, we would like to welcome a Data Engineer into our team. They will already be on a successful career path and looking to take the next step with increased responsibility and be a part of our growth story.   Cobblestone Values:   Lifelong learning with continuous reflection Independent thinking through a meritocracy of ideas The team is more important than the individual Being the best in any market we enter Hiring and keeping only the most effective people Others must benefit from our existence.     Job Description    At Cobblestone Energy we are on a mission to build the most advanced European electricity trading and analytics platform, with our technology being used by our teams of commercial traders to create significant value. Being the Data Engineer of our team, you will work on exciting challenges that come with large-scale data processing, automation, and analytics. We work in an agile and highly collaborative environment and challenge the norms of traditional business leadership. We are looking for enthusiastic and resourceful engineers who are passionate about building highly reliable and performance data processing solutions. You want to help the commercial team make data-informed decisions, have a curious mindset, and are motivated to understand our business better. Developing a strong domain knowledge of our industry over time is key to long term success in this role.   This is a rare opportunity to take a leading role in the growth of a major player in the European Electricity Markets. We are looking for someone who would be committed to the long-term success of the business. We operate in the European Energy markets, but our commercial trading operations are in Dubai, UAE.   We are looking for an experienced Data Engineer to join our Tech team at Cobblestone Energy. You will be responsible for building our data pipelines and you will be also participating in setting the right Infrastructure and developing the needed tools for our Analytics.   If you have excellent data engineering skills, strong problem-solving skills, and a passion for developing applications utilizing cutting edge technologies, then we would like to meet you.    What We Offer In This Role    Competitive remuneration, with fast progression for strong performers. A challenging but exciting, open, and fun work environment. An opportunity to work with remarkably talented colleagues. Vast growth potential in every aspect. Performance based bonus. Employee share scheme participation International relocation support Opportunity to be embedded within a commercial team for those with strong commercial interest     Responsibilities    Gather and address technical and design requirements. Architect our data platform & develop real-time apps ingesting large volume of data and processing messages real-time. Handle all our data pipeline and contribute towards our data strategy and its execution. Architecting, building, testing & managing our data platform infrastructure from data collection all the way to data processing & data storage. Develop, customize and manage integration tools, monitoring tools, databases, warehouses, and analytical systems. Support the developers through training and transfer of knowledge. Participate in the entire application life-cycle mainly focusing on coding, debugging, and testing.     Requirements    BSc degree in Computer Science/Computer Engineering. Masters is a plus. Strong competencies in algorithms and software architecture. 3+ years of experience in Python. 2+ years of experience as a Data Engineer. Strong experience in real-time data processing and data ingestion. Strong experience in batch data processing and data pipelines. Strong work experience in AWS Kinesis Services and building apps utilizing it is a must. 3+ years of experience in developing APIs (REST & SOAP protocols). 2+ years of experience in using AWS cloud and its resources/services. Strong experience in Relational Databases (MySQL, SQL Server or PostgreSQL) and non-relational databases (Mongo DB or Cassandra. etc.) Strong knowledge in Continuous Integration & Continuous Deployment (CI/CD) utilizing Docker containers. Strong knowledge in Pandas & NumPy libraries is a big plus. Strong knowledge in workflow orchestration tools (Airflow …etc.) is a plus. Experience in Java is a plus. Previous experience in automated testing including unit testing & UI testing is a plus. Strong in-depth understanding of the entire web development process (design, development, and deployment) Excellent analytical, time management and teamwork skills.    Some videos for your reference:  Who is Elexon? For the UK market, they are the system administrator.   https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A5j-S6VGqpw#action=share   Some general information about electricity trading arrangements in the UK   https://youtu.be/UDv04q3U6e0   Elexon sushi video. Tries to explain the balancing of the UK's electricity grid   https://vimeo.com/65768597   The videos above are UK centric, but our current interest is Europe wide. Feel free to research the other markets. This is a longer video that to me explains why there is such large opportunity going forward for the electricity traders who are able to efficiently analyse supply and demand fundamentals and move power between countries, for the benefit of all.   https://youtu.be/gacGuWjqKco .  Once Europe is conquered, we do genuinely intend on going global. The American power markets look next on the plate, followed by the Australian and Japanese.

Title: ME Equipment Engineer
Description: Job Description    This position is associated with the sale of Intel’s NAND memory and storage business to SK hynix. (You can read more about the transaction in the press release). The transaction will enhance the resources and potential of the business’ storage solutions, including client and enterprise SSDs, in the rapidly growing NAND Flash space amid the era of big data.   This is an exciting time to be at Intel – come join our NAND-DTM and work on the most advanced 3DNAND and SSD technology in the world. As the global leader in the semiconductor industry, Intel possesses industry-leading SSD technology and the most capable Quadruple Level Cell (QLC) NAND Flash products, and you will be part of a world-class team that will transition to lead the SSD business at SK hynix.   This position aligns to Phase 2 of the transaction, which includes NAND technology and component development along with fab operations. Employees aligned to Phase 2 will continue to be employed by Intel and will continue to develop NAND technology and components and manufacture NAND wafers at the fab. Phase 2 of the transaction is expected to close in March 2025, at which time employees aligned to this phase of the transaction will transition employment to SK hynix.    Responsibilities Include, But Are Not Limited To    Complete all required safety training and ensure all work is conducted in accordance with Intel safety policies Coach equipment MT (Manufacturing Technician) team and developing Machine professionalism. Perform troubleshooting on tool excursions issue. Participate task force, ensure continuous improvements of the tools and module. Participate cost saving project for maximization factory quality output and cost performance. Work with material team and supplier to maintain spare safe stock level. Implement change to improve output, quality or cost reduction. Partner with global counterparts to identify and align to best known methods. Optimize existing process and reducing scrap and excursions. Assume additional duties and projects as directed by the supervisor. Maintain flexibility to be on call to address production line needs.    Qualifications    Bachelor+ degree in a related science or engineering major, such as Electrical Engineering, Materials Science, Physics, Chemistry or Chemical Engineering, etc.…. 3+ years equipment experience in semiconductor manufacturing. Demonstrated understanding of SPC, stats and DOE. Data extraction, analysis, and reporting skills. Proven ability to communicate and present technical information effectively. Proven ability to troubleshoot complex equipment problems and address root cause. Demonstrated success in partnering with others. Demonstrated strong attention to detail and organizational skills. Strong partnering and teamwork skills.   Education (Desired degree & major)  Must possess a bachelor or master degree in a related science or engineering major, such as Electrical Engineering, Materials Science, Physics, Chemistry or Chemical Engineering, etc.….   Inside this Business Group  Employees in Intel's NAND Product Group deliver solutions that are transforming computing across all segments from data centers to Ultrabooks. They invent, develop, bring to market and support customers with leading-edge NAND flash memory and system level solutions such as solid state drives (SSDs). SSDs are accelerating performance for gaming enthusiasts, reducing total cost of ownership for IT managers of data centers and improving security and reliability for businesses. This dynamic group is strategically positioned to become the leading Non-Volatile Memory solution supplier for the compute segment and is a key to expanding markets and continuing the growth for Intel.

Title: Data Analyst
Description: Job Description  Main Responsibilities   Analyze and lead in Engineering and Marketing requirements and understand FCV Oracle Global Design Requirements Design and implement system and process improvements identified by user request or by proactive engagement in the business Conduct data analysis on opportunities identified or user requests and create data tools when necessary to identify data gaps in product portfolio, narrow down or fill in the gaps by standardizing existing special product offerings to reduce work content of Sales/OE/Product Engineer and bring good impact to lead time Coordinate and implement Business Intelligence to fulfill management and users reporting requirements Participate in cross world area meetings and conference calls to resolve issues and to participate instance testing when required Interact and communicate effectively with global engineering organizations, sales, LBPs, marketing, order entry, manufacturing, supply chain, IT and FF2/Oracle team as required to reduce enterprise lead-time via the right product structure offerings    Qualifications /Experience   BSME/MSME or equivalent in Mechanical Engineering, Automation or Related Areas Possess good analytical & problem-solving skills, and an ability & willingness to undertake multi-tasks and work under tight schedule Knowledge on Oracle Engineering and Inventory modules is an added advantage Have experience in Business Intelligence and Reporting tools like Microsoft SQL Server, Power BI, Power Excel, and Noetix Proficient Computer Skills Including Microsoft Office, ERP Knowledge/Experience on IT Systems or Information Management, Hands-On Experience with Databases is Preferred Effective in spoken and written English    About Us  WHY EMERSON  Our Commitment to Our People  Across the globe, we are united by a singular Purpose: We drive innovation that makes the world healthier, safer, smarter, and more sustainable.  We invest in our employees to ensure they have the marketplace knowledge, skills, and competencies to bring this Purpose to life while competing and leading in a global economy.   Our training programs focus on end-to-end development, from onboarding through senior leadership.   Our success is measured by the positive impact we make on people, our communities, and the world through our unwavering focus on environmental, social, and regulatory progress. Learn more about us!   Our Commitment to Diversity, Equity & Inclusion  At Emerson, we are committed to fostering a culture where every employee is valued and respected for their unique experiences and perspectives. We believe a diverse and inclusive work environment contributes to the rich exchange of ideas and diversity of thoughts, that inspires innovation and brings the best solutions to our customers.   This philosophy is fundamental to living our company’s values and our responsibility to leave the world in a better place. Learn more about our Culture & Values and about Diversity, Equity & Inclusion at Emerson .   If you have a disability and are having difficulty accessing or using this website to apply for a position, please contact: idisability.administrator@emerson.com .   About Emerson  Emerson is a leading global technology, software and engineering company providing innovative solutions for customers in industrial, commercial, and residential markets.   Our Automation Solutions business helps process, hybrid and discrete manufacturers maximize production, protect personnel and the environment while optimizing their energy and operating costs.   Our Commercial & Residential Solutions business helps ensure human comfort and health, protect food quality and safety, advance energy efficiency and create sustainable infrastructure.   We help customers in the world’s most essential industries solve the biggest challenges of modern life.   Every day, our global workforce fulfills our unified Purpose and lives out the Values we hold close as an organization: Integrity, Safety & Quality, Support Our People, Customer Focus, Continuous Improvement, Collaboration, and Innovation.  Our Causes – Planet, Humanity, Champion, Inclusion and Future  – shape, define and fuel Emerson’s culture while inspiring our innovative spirit and driving our focus.   Whether you’re an established professional looking for a career change, an undergraduate student exploring possibilities, or recently received your master’s degree, you’ll find opportunities with us. Join our team and start your journey today!   No calls or agencies please.

Title: Application Engineer
Description: 概述  Support and build a strong team of application chemists/specialists for pre-sales and post-sales supports to Bruker’s Life Science Mass Spectrometry business. The position will be required to provide instrument demonstrations & sample analyses for prospective BDAL LSMS customers, and applications & technical support and trainings to other BDAL LSMS customers in China.   职责   To be responsible for Omics related research solution development based in our Application Development Laboratory in Beijing. He/she will work align with our global proteomics and biopharma team to deliver all the Bruker solution & technology on Omics to China customer. Plan and execute marketing campaigns, including seminars, workshops, roadshows by giving technical presentations in Chinese (mostly), and sometimes in English for both MALDI & ESI related instrument. Independently conduct demonstration experiments, application training course for QTOF and MALDI related instrument at customer sites or Demo Lab. Able to answer questions for customers regarding the instrument operation, data processing and sample preparation. Demonstrate capabilities of Q-TOF, MALDI through analysis of sample sets and reporting the results to prospective customers. Translate marketing material including brochures, application notes and other marketing collateral.   Communicate regularly with the factory product/marketing managers to develop local China marketing and tactics to align with the global strategy; to generate relevant marketing materials for China market; to organize and conduct internal training to sales team.   资质   Master degree or Ph.D degree in Chemistry or Biochemistry or related field is a pre-requisite. Experience in sample preparation, sample analysis and data analysis of proteomics or metabolomics. Minimum 3-years of hands-on user experience in operating ESI-MS instrumentation. Experience with Bruker MS instrumentation is considered an advantage. Highly motivated, team player, quick learner, self starter and problem solver. Excellent oral and written communication skills. Good presentation skills. Ability to work in a fast-paced collaborative research environment. Ability to dissect problems and projects into manageable tasks.

Title: Data Engineer（大数据开发工程师）
Description: At Jungle Scout, we are on a mission to empower entrepreneurs and brands to grow successful e-commerce businesses, and we provide the industry-leading data, powerful tools, and resources they need.    We’re growing and we are looking to add an Data Engineer to our fast-paced and customer-oriented Engineering team.    Location（工作地点）：Shenzhen    Interested in learning more? Let’s get into the details（工作内容）:    1、Build, scale, and support data collection systems that power our SaaS products that provide actionable data to brands of all sizes.  2、Collaborate with team members and other product/engineering teams to define new data collection architectures and execute incrementally towards a target state.  3、Serve as a thought leader for other team members regarding system design, data collection, data cleaning and data managing.  4、Identify opportunities to simplify and improve our data collection systems so we can efficiently scale our operations as we grow.  5、Understand and solve business requirements at scale with high-quality software solutions.    Who You Are（经验要求）:  1、3 + years working experience Expert in at least one object-oriented language like NodeJS, Python, or Java. You pride yourself on writing clean, well-tested, maintainable code.  2、Comfortable with complex SQL.  3、Hands-on experience with cloud computing platforms like AWS, Azure, or GCP.  4、History of shipping impactful distributed data pipelines for both batch and/or real-time processing.  5、Passionate about data quality and delivering data that impacts the business.  6、Product mindset to understand business needs and develop scalable engineering solutions.  7、Experience with discovering and addressing high performance issues across the whole stack, from applications to operating systems.  8、Passion for exploring new technologies and ability to learn quickly on the job.  9、Ability to thrive with ambiguity. Fuzzy requirements are more common for you than clearly defined expectations.  10、Excellent English written and verbal communication skills.    Bonus Points（加分项）:  1、Experience deploying and monitoring machine learning models.  2、Experience building intuitive data models that abstract complex data relationships and business logic.  3、Experience running Spark workloads on AWS.  4、Expert on AWS and experience working in a DevOps environment, where automating infrastructure with code is second hand.

Title: Ingénieur DevOps F/H
Description: 28/03/2022   Axians Cloud Services Provider France  , basée à La Garenne-Colombes  ( 92  ), Lorient  ( 56  ) et Toulouse  ( 31  ) est spécialisée dans le déploiement et l’infogérance à distance, d’architectures informatiques critiques et complexes, nécessitant des infrastructures innovantes et sur mesure.   Nous sommes aujourd’hui environ 80 collaborateurs. Dans le cadre de notre croissance, nous recherchons à La Garenne Colombes (92  ), en CDI  , un Ingénieur DevOps F/H  .   VOS MISSIONS   Moderniser les applications de nos clients, via containerisation et approche micro-service Mettre en place et maintenir des chaines CI/CD Accompagnement client dans la mise en œuvre Participer aux différentes cérémonies agiles (daily meeting, sprint planning, etc.) Automatiser des processus de build, release et déploiement Réaliser le support de niveau 2/3 dans le cadre du traitement des incidents Faire de la veille technologique Former les équipes de MCO sur la résolution d’incidents spécifiques   De formation BTS, DUT informatique, Ingénieur ou Master, vous disposez d’une expérience de plus de 5 ans dans la matière. Vous êtes passionné et souhaitez continuer de monter en compétence sur de nouvelles technologies, vous êtes orientés « clients » et aimez les défis : cette annonce est pour vous !   Nous recherchons un Ingénieur DevOps capable d’intervenir tant sur la mise en œuvre et maintient de solutions internes mais également sur des projets clients.    Compétences Requises    Connaissance des systèmes d’exploitation Linux et Windows Langage de programmation Python et Powershell Bonne compréhension des architectures dont réseaux Utilisation de solution de versionning de code (Gitlab, Github, Jenkins) Utilisation de solution de containerisation (Docker, Kubernetes) Utilisation des différentes cloud providers (AWS, AZURE, GCP) Bon rédactionnel et relationnel Capacité à être autonome sur des sujets complexes    Expériences Appréciées    Mise en œuvre de chaine de déploiement de site web et/ou application métier Développement mettant en œuvre les API d’un fournisseur de cloud Containerisation et migration d’applications Utilisation d’Ansible, Grafana, ElasticSearch, Terraform sont des plus   POURQUOI NOUS REJOINDRE ?  Rejoindre Axians  , c’est rejoindre un réseau d’entreprises agiles présentes dans 26 pays  et composé de 12 000 collaborateurs  réalisant un CA de 2,6 Milliards d’euros  .   Axians est la marque de VINCI Energies  dédiée aux solutions ICT  , c’est-à-dire la maitrise de l’ensemble des technologies de l’information et de la communication  : Infrastructures Télécoms, Cloud & Data Center, Réseaux d’entreprises, Digital Workspace, Business Applications & Data Analytics, Cyber Sécurité, Audiovisuel.   Nous accompagnons nos clients – entreprises privées, secteur public, opérateurs et fournisseurs de services - dans la transformation  de leurs solutions digitales  .   Why us?   Rejoignez Une Entreprise à Taille Humaine Et Bénéficiez De La Force Du Groupe VINCI     Prêt(e) à relever de nouveaux défis .   Un management de proximité Des équipes autonomes dans un environnement collaboratif Des possibilités d’évolution, de formations et de mobilité au sein d’un Groupe international Le partage de nos réussites (Plan Epargne Groupe) et de nombreux avantages complémentaires (tarifs préférentiels assurances, réductions sur l’achat de programme neuf immobilier, abonnement télépéage …) La possibilité de participer à des actions solidaires, collectives ou individuelles : l’association « Elles bougent », la Parisienne, Mécénat Chirurgie Cardiaque…    Axians Cloud Services Provider France, Vous Aurez Aussi    L'opportunité de participer au développement d’une société innovante L’opportunité de travailler avec des équipes jeunes et dynamiques Des Tickets Restaurant Un Restaurant Inter-Entreprises (RIE) Une offre de cooptation intéressante Une mutuelle et une prévoyance Un intéressement aux résultats, ...    Nos offres sont accessibles aux personnes en situation de handicap.    L’association Trajeo’h, partenaire privilégié du Groupe, nous accompagne tout au long du processus de recrutement et d’intégration.   Entity  In a world undergoing constant change, VINCI Energies focuses on connections, performance, energy efficiency and data to fast-track the rollout of new technologies and support two major changes: the digital transformation and the energy transition. With their strong regional roots, agile and innovative, VINCI Energies' business units boost the reliability, safety and efficiency of energy, transport and communication infrastructure, factories, buildings and information systems. 2021: €15.7 billion revenue // 85,700 employees // 1,800 business units // 55 countries www.vinci-energies.com

Title: Professional, Data Analyst
Description: What This Job Involves  Day-to-day activities include gathering data and analysis as well as writing reports on major trends in China’s retail, office, and logistics property markets. The analyst will become an expert in the real estate industry in Chengdu and entire West China region covering Chengdu, Chongqing, and other gateway cities. In the process, the analyst will make a considerable contribution to the quality and accuracy of research produced by the firm, tailored consulting projects, and development of a constantly evolving “house view” on property. Ideally such a “house view” will involve cultivating expertise on China’s macroeconomic situation and how it influences local property markets. The analyst also will help the coordinate the production of China-wide reports for JLL’s Real Estate Intelligence Service (REIS), reporting to China central research team.    Use primary and secondary data sources to develop, enhance and leverage understanding of China’s national and city economies, demographics, and commercial real estate markets. Develop expertise in key industries like e-commerce, consumer and retail dynamics, transport infrastructure and distribution networks, shopping mall and warehouse development, etc. Conduct fieldwork, including vacancy and tenant inspections of existing projects as well as assessment of future project completion dates by cultivating local contacts and conducting interviews. Serve as a client facing conduit for JLL research, actively participating in pitches, presentations and projects. Author quarterly research reports and blogs; periodically contribute to themed white papers. Contribute in ongoing efforts at new product development, including Tableau and ArcGIS products Prepare market presentations, client reports, and studies. Coordinate the production of reports by colleagues in Shanghai and across China. Review colleagues’ report drafts for accuracy and quality of analysis. Work with analysts to audit and improve collected quarterly data.     To apply you need to be     A demonstrated interest in (or exposure to) office or retail real estate Fluency in English is required; Research reports are written bilingually in English/Chinese High-level analytical and problem-solving skills, and strategic-thinking capacity Advanced proficiency in Microsoft Excel, experience with Tableau and ArcGIS is a plus. Experienced, polished and innovative presentation skills and high attention to detail Willingness to develop proficiency with new platforms to identify insights through data analytics and mapping Self-motivated, able to work independently and travel independently when required (role is at least 20% travel)     Work experience and Education Credentials     Bachelor’s degree in business, economic, social sciences, or related field preferred; master’s degree a plus China-specific exposure to property investment and/or property-related consulting, urban planning, or other related field is a major plus     JLL Privacy Notice    Jones Lang LaSalle (JLL), together with its subsidiaries and affiliates, is a leading global provider of real estate and investment management services. We take our responsibility to protect the personal information provided to us seriously. Generally the personal information we collect from you are for the purposes of processing in connection with JLL’s recruitment process. We endeavour to keep your personal information secure with appropriate level of security and keep for as long as we need it for legitimate business or legal reasons. We will then delete it safely and securely.   For more information about how JLL processes your personal data, please view our Candidate Privacy Statement.   For additional details please see our career site pages for each country.   For employees in the United States, please see a fully copy of our Equal Employment Opportunity and Affirmative Action policy here.   Jones Lang LaSalle (“JLL”) is an Equal Opportunity Employer and is committed to working with and providing reasonable accommodations to individuals with disabilities. If you need a reasonable accommodation because of a disability for any part of the employment process – including the online application and/or overall selection process – you may email us at AccomodationRequest@am.jll.com. This email is only to request an accommodation. Please direct any other general recruiting inquiries to our Contact Us page > I want to work for JLL.

Title: Raw Material Technology Scouting Technician
Description: Description & Requirements    Who we are   lululemon is a yoga-inspired technical apparel company up to big things. The practice and philosophy of yoga informs our overall purpose to elevate the world through the power of practice. We are proud to be a growing global company with locations all around the world, from Vancouver to Shanghai, and places in between. We owe our success to our innovative product, our emphasis on our stores, our commitment to our people, and the incredible connections we get to make in every community we are in.    About This Team    The Raw Materials Innovation team shapes, surprises and engineers delight into the future guest experience through raw materials innovation principles and material science. We go beyond the classic research and development methodologies into the realm of limitless possibility for both body and mind. We innovate new materials that didn't exist, we create new experiences for our guests that they didn't know that they wanted it. We get our guests altogether and engineer new sensations in our materials they've never experienced. We need you to work on short, mid and long-term projects by defining 'state of the art', leading research, building insight, generating unique point of view, creating prototypes and proving principles.    A Day In The Life    Explore and identify new Innovative Products in Industry and bring in new ideas based on RM Innovation roadmap. In depth analysis of product development considering traceability. LCA, MSDS, TDS, regulatory compliance, and update RM Innovation team at every stage. Capturing and monitoring process flow, process variables and control parameters of each project at development during trial runs and support Raw Materials Innovation team in commercialization goals. Creating final production process with all the key parameters and standard process for bulk scalability. Risk assessment and quality issue resolution by processing mapping and product data analysis with RM Innovation team and Supplier partners. Collaborate with other functional team by Sharing practices with production and QA functions to support best in class product and meet the science of feel and enhance guest experience. Align product standards to Lululemon Global quality standards by testing at development. Attend chosen seminars and international exhibitions in the region scouting for new and improved innovations in textile fiber, fabric, process, or chemical finishes with focus on sustainable and carbon footprint to achieve support sustainability goal. Build connections with Industry leaders, Technical and R&D teams.    Qualifications    Master's degree or PhD in Textiles or Fiber Sciences or an allied field with a strong emphasis on fiber, textile, or material. 5-6 years of apparel industry experience in fiber, textiles, or materials. 3-4 years proven management experience leading a team and business strategies. Experience working on site with manufacturers around the world and strong knowledge of supply chain operations. Proven team player with knowledge of cross-functional team accountabilities and requirements. Ability to simultaneously manage complex projects and clearly communicate updates to key stakeholders. Excellent communication skills, both written and oral. Able to communicate findings to both scientists and nonscientists with strong presentation skills. Thirst for continuous education within the textile and corresponding industries. Capacity to observe, listen and read between the lines, your analytical mind leads others to seek you out. You have innovation running through your veins and you create with a true solution focus whatever the application. Critical thinking, problem solving, and analytical skills to determine which tests to conduct and to interpret the results of those tests. You sweat every day because you are the best product tester you know. Understanding that success is found in an attention to detail throughout the entire process and you put the guest first. You may well be the world's greatest entrepreneurial scientist.    Must Haves    Acknowledges the presence of choice in every moment and takes personal responsibility for their life. Possesses an entrepreneurial spirit and continuously innovates to achieve great results. Communicates with honesty and kindness and creates the space for others to do the same. Leads with courage, knowing the possibility of greatness is bigger than the fear of failure. Fosters connection by putting people first and building trusting relationships. Integrates fun and joy as a way of being and working, aka doesn't take themselves too seriously.

Use NLP,Vision and ML techniques to bring order to unstructured data Experience in extracting signal from noise in large unstructured datasets a plus Work within the Engineering Team to design, code, train, test, deploy and iterate on enterprise scale machine learning systems Work alongside an excellent, cross-functional team across Engineering, Product and Design   The Successful Applicant   Experience in applying machine learning techniques, Natural Language Processing or Computer Vision using TensorFlow, Pytorch Strong analytical and problem-solving skills Solid software engineering skills across multiple languages including but not limited to Java or Python, C/C++ Problem solver - able to work independently, and be comfortable with deadlines and milestones Deep understanding of ML techniques such as: classification, clustering, deep learning, optimization methods, supervised and unsupervised techniques Strong communication skills and an easy going attitude Proven ability to apply, debug, and develop machine learning models for real-world applications Previous industry work experience required  What's on Offer  Ongoing digital transformation projects   Work in all English environment and has the impart on business   Stable and globalised platform   Contact: Amber Zhou  Quote job ref: JN-082021-3251643

Title: Process Engineer
Description: Why work at Entegris?   Lead. Inspire. Innovate. Define Your Future.   Not everyone who works for a global company shares the same background, experiences and perspectives. We leverage the differences of our employees to bring new ideas to the table. Every employee throughout the company is encouraged to share input on projects and initiatives. Our decision making process is truly a collaborative effort as we realize there are leaders at every level of the organization. We put our values at the core of how we operate as an organization — not just when it’s convenient, but in a lasting and meaningful way. We want the time and energy you spend here to have a positive impact on your life inside and outside of the office.   Entegris is a values-driven culture and our employees rally around our core PACE values:P eople  A ccountability  C  reativity  E xcellence  The Role  We are currently seeking an R&D Engineer  for the Membrane R&D group within the Entegris Hangzhou Division (Anow). This position will be based at our Xin Deng, Zhejiang  site. As part of the Membrane R&D organization, a successful candidate will participate in the development of novel membranes and porous media for the life science and flat panel display industry.   In this role you will   Individuals in this position will be responsible for s ynthesis, preparation and modification of polymers; The engineer will participate in the whi le development stage of the synthesis and application of polymer modifiers with a focus on the research of laboratory synthesis formulations and modification processes; T h e engineer will participate in solving technical problems and quality problems of related products ； Completes miscellaneous tasks assigned by supervisor ； 负责 - 高分子化合物的合成、制备和改性； 参与改性剂的合成与应用的整个开发阶段，重点是实验室合成配方与改性工艺的研究； 参与相关产品的生产技术问题和质量问题的解决； 完成主管交办的其他工作。    Traits we believe make a strong candidate   Bachelor degree and above; preferably to be master degree Work experience: no requirement Major: Chemistry-related majors such as organic chemistry, polymer physics and chemistry, etc. Technical skills: Background in polymer synthesis, polymer modification, organic chemistry synthesis, etc.; background in membrane surface modification is preferred; Background in hollow fiber membrane is preferred; English Skill: Good reading and writing English skills. Possess strong experimental design ability, data analysis ability and experimental practical ability, and be proficient in operating conventional instruments. Good sense of teamwork, strong adaptability; Innovative spirit. 学历要求：本科及以上 ; 优选硕士 工作经验：不限 专业要求：有机化学、高分子物理与化学等化学相关专业 , 具有高分子合成、聚合物改性、有机化学合成等相关背景；具有膜表面改性相关背景优先考虑； 具有中空纤维膜相关经验值优先考虑； 外语要求：英语良好 有较强的实验设计能力、数据分析能力及实验动手能力，熟练操作常规仪器； 良好的化学专业写作能力，较好的英文阅读能力； 具有团队合作意识，适应能力强，能承受工作压力；    热爱研发具有创新精神。   Your success will be measured by   Your ability to accomplish our individual and collective goals and commitments, through timely and effective execution of tasks, and collaboration with others; Your ability to work well with others - acknowledge contributions, value time and opinions, and treat them. Your openness, honesty, directness, and commitment. We ask this of others. We should expect this of ourselves. Your independent thinking and creative approaches. One can be inquisitive and innovative, yet focus on goals. We should learn from our endeavors, regardless of outcome. Your determination to do it well, and to do it right. We should leverage our collective knowledge, experience, and skills…we are stronger as a team. 通过及时有效的执行任务以及与他人的协作，完成我们个人和集体的目标和承诺 ; 你与他人良好合作的能力——承认贡献，珍惜时间和意见，并善待他们 ; 你的开放、诚实、直接和承诺。我们应该对自己有这样的期望 ; 独立思考和创新能力。一个人可以是好奇的和创新的，专注于目标，无论结果如何，我们都应该从我们的努力中学习 ;    有把事情做好和把事情做好的决心。我们应该利用我们的集体知识、经验和技能……作为一个团队，我们会更强大   What we offer:  Our total rewards package goes above and beyond just a paycheck. Whether you’re looking to build your career, improve your health, or protect your wealth, we offer generous benefits to help you achieve your goals.    Very Competitive total compensation plans. A 401(K) plan to help you plan for your future with an impressive employer match that’s all yours- no vesting! Great health, dental and vision insurance packages to fit your needs to ensure you’re happy and healthy. A progressive PTO policy that empowers our employees to take the time they need to recharge!    At Entegris we are committed to providing equal opportunity to all employees and applicants. Our policy is to recruit, hire, train, and reward employees for their individual abilities, achievements and experience without regard to race, color, religion, sexual orientation, age, national origin, disability, marital or military status.

Title: Expert Database Administrator (Bangkok based, relocation provided)
Description: About Agoda  Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 2.5 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 4,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.   Get to Know Our Team  The Data department oversees all of Agoda’s data-related requirements. Our ultimate goal is to enable and increase the use of data in the company through creative approaches and the implementation of powerful resources such as operational and analytical databases, queue systems, BI tools, and data science technology. We hire the brightest minds from around the world to take on this challenge and equip them with the knowledge and tools that contribute to their personal growth and success while supporting our company’s culture of diversity and experimentation. The role the Data team plays at Agoda is critical as business users, product managers, engineers, and many others rely on us to empower their decision making. We are equally dedicated to our customers by improving their search experience with faster results and protecting them from any fraudulent activities. Data is interesting only when you have enough of it, and we have plenty. This is what drives up the challenge as part of the Data department, but also the reward.   The Opportunity:  We manage tera bytes of content, we run machine learning algorithms that require up-to-date feature data of all user events to optimize the user experience and so on… Luckily, we have the latest tech to match the challenge, we employ Cassandra, ScyllaDB, Aerospike, Couchbase, Elasticsearch, PostgreSQL, CockroachDB and others with overall 1600 database instances and 99.9999% uptime.   If you think this is cool, you are reading the right job description. We are looking for passionate engineers who are excited by solving problems in scale, understanding the technology down to bit and know how to automate the operation for 1000s of servers at the same time. Working in our scale, everything is important – understanding the OS and disk controller, understanding the different runtime implications of JVM and knowing all the bells and whistles that each DB engine has to offer.   In this Role, you’ll get to:   Proactive monitoring to detect unusual behavior on production database by creating automation & visibility i.e. high query resource usage, unusual database traffic, database server capacity, etc. and coordinate with Engineering team to optimize it before it becomes to be big incident Communicating and reviewing database solutions, technical, applications with Operations Staff and Application Developers to ensure scalability, integrity and security of database Troubleshooting database issue and performance tuning Research, test, evaluate and recommend solutions (existing & emerging) with match for best use cases    What you’ll Need to Succeed:   At least 5 years hands-on Database Administrator experience Solid production experiences in a “high transactional” 24×7 OLTP of MS SQL Server administration Mid-level to expert within one or more of the following NoSQL (Cassandra, ScyllaDB, Couchbase or Elasticsearch) Willing to learn new data engine technology such as Cassandra, ScyllaDB, Couchbase, Elasticsearch, PostgreSQL and Aerospike Be able to work under pressure and to deadlines Be the good team player with good interpersonal and communication skills Be able to work multi-task and context-switch effectively between different activities and teams Be able to attend On-Call rotation Excellent English written and verbal communication    It’s Great if you have:   Expert in one or more of Cassandra, ScyllaDB, Couchbase, Elasticsearch , Aerospike, Redis or Ignite Automate deployment by using Puppet, Ansible Development automate operation tasks with Shell Script, Python Consul, Docker, Kubernetes, Openstack Linux system administration    #sydney #melbourne #london #tokyo #dhaka #edinburgh #amsterdam #munich #moscow #kyiv #singapore #jakarta #dublin #saopaulo #bogota #colombo #taipei #warsaw #stockholm #copenhagen #seoul #hcmc #telaviv #belarus #buenoaires #beijing #santiago   Equal Opportunity Employer  At Agoda, we pride ourselves on being a company represented by people of all different backgrounds and orientations. We prioritize attracting diverse talent and cultivating an inclusive environment that encourages collaboration and innovation. Employment at Agoda is based solely on a person’s merit and qualifications. We are committed to providing equal employment opportunity regardless of sex, age, race, color, national origin, religion, marital status, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability, citizenship, veteran or military status, and other legally protected characteristics.   We will keep your application on file so that we can consider you for future vacancies and you can always ask to have your details removed from the file. For more details please read our privacy policy .   To all recruitment agencies: Agoda does not accept third party resumes. Please do not send resumes to our jobs alias, Agoda employees or any other organization location. Agoda is not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited resumes.

Title: Embedded Software Engineer
Description: Nexperia  is a world-class company in semiconductor development and in-house production. A proven global player with an entrepreneurial mentality. At our core is an 13,000+ strong international network with a singular focus. Built on passion and commitment to our work, belief in our goals and a drive to succeed regardless of the challenges we face. We support, reward and challenge individuals equally, in a dynamic and energetic environment.    About The Role    Embedded Software Engineer is responsible for product verification and application. Implement firmware in reference designs. Continuously improve user experience with customer documents, reference designs and trainings.   What You Will Do   Provide software support to customers in all phases of product design process including evaluation, design-in and production. Provide support on usage of Nexperia demos/reference designs. Understand customer requests and participate in new product enhancement (NPI Process). Provide support to Nexperia market and system engineering team, provide proposals during product development, evaluation board build-up, software development and system-level debug to ensure a successful product design launch. Work proactively on optimizing solutions together with AE & RnD colleagues. Build firmware based on specified microcontrollers/DSPs, build the software part of test boards and test programs for device verification. Generate/review user manuals, data sheets and application notes. Prepare and conduct product/demo trainings to customers and partners.     What You Will Need    Hard Skills:   Bachelor/master degree in E/E or computer science. Strong skills in embedded SW programming. Familiar with at least one mainstream MCU/DSP on the market, such as TI 28335, ST stm32, etc. Knowledge of Electrical/Electronic circuits, IC or power devices Experienced with using test equipment, design test program. Technical writing skills for creating application notes, papers, and user guides / reference manuals. Experience of any following application would be a plus: OBC/DCDC/UPS/Solar inverter/Industrial inverter.    Soft Skills:   Motivate team of engineers Typical Academic Profile Basic understanding of Electrical / Electronic circuits Good computer skills (e.g. using Excel to analyze data and prepare report). Fluent in English    Talent acquisition based on Nexperia vacancies is not appreciated. Nexperia job adverts are Nexperia copyright © material and the word Nexperia® is a registered trademark.  Nexperia is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer.

Title: Client Performance Engineer (desktop, mobile)
Description: Job Description    Are you Interested in being on the front lines of understanding and analyzing CPU and platform performance in the client market segment? If so, we are looking for individuals who want to be hands-on with setting up systems for testing; generating performance, power, and battery life data; analyzing the results to understand why they are the way they are; concisely summarizing the impact, and then making recommendations based on that analysis, to both engineering and marketing (leading to impacts on engineering, sales and marketing). This role will provide opportunities for owning and improving processes within the team.   The position is for: Permanent blue badge employees only.    A Successful Candidate Will Demonstrate And/or Be Differentiated By    Ability to build/install/debug client computer systems (including Intel internal client platforms). Understanding of client system and CPU architecture and what contributes to client performance and power use. Strong initiative, data analysis, and problem-solving skills. Working knowledge of benchmarks/workloads/analysis/power measurement Familiarity with the installation/operation/tuning of Windows and Linux. Clear communications skills.    Qualifications    � Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering or a related field with 3+ years of experience setting up/debugging client computer systems (including Intel internal client platforms or from components) running Windows or; Master's degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering, or a related field with 1 years of experience setting up/debugging client computer systems (including Intel internal client platforms or from components) running Windows.   Inside this Business Group  The Client Computing Group (CCG) is responsible for driving business strategy and product development for Intel's PC products and platforms, spanning form factors such as notebooks, desktops, 2 in 1s, all in ones. Working with our partners across the industry, we intend to continue to advance PC experiences to deliver the real-world performance people demand. As the largest business unit at Intel, CCG is investing more heavily in the PC, ramping its capabilities even more aggressively, and designing the PC experience even more deliberately, including delivering a predictable cadence of leadership products. As a result, we are able to fuel innovation across Intel, providing an important source of IP and scale, as well as help the company deliver on its purpose of enriching the lives of every person on earth.

Title: R&D Engineer
Company Name: 上海维塔士电脑软件有限公司
Description: 工作职责: As R&D Engineer at Virtuos, you will help create the production pipelines and workflows that will shape the future of the entertainment industry. The role will span problems from computer vision, geometry processing, image processing, procedural generation… A heavy focus on algorithms and machine learning will be key to help scale the group’s efforts to engineer innovative machine learning algorithms. You should be comfortable in a R&D environment with rapid changing goals and requirements. You will act as an individual contributor for Virtuos’ technical research and development program on state-of-the-art tools for production pipelines in the entertainment industry. You will own one long-term problem statement in one of our 4 areas of focus: Data Science, Machine Learning, Programming Languages, and Operating Systems. 作为维塔士的研发工程师，你将帮助创建将塑造娱乐行业未来的制作流程和工作流程。职责将涵盖计算机视觉、几何处理、图像处理和程序生成等问题。重点关注算法和机器学习将是帮助团队设计创新机器学习算法的关键。你应该适应身处目标和需求快速变化的研发环境。 你将作为独立贡献者参与维塔士的技术研发计划，该计划为娱乐行业的生产流程提供最先进的工具。 你需要在以下四个重点领域中至少熟悉和擅长其中一块的业务：数据科学、机器学习、编程语言和操作系统。   Coordinate with your lead to refine and solve your problem statement, including formalize problem statement, track progress on problem statement, identify variables, construct models and develop solvers Customize existed algorithms or develop new algorithms to achieve project requirement Participate in the whole pipeline of machine learning development, including training data collection, feature engineering, model training, offline and online experiment Coordinate with the R&D Team to convert requests to problems and solutions to products Track our progress with respect to specific products Integrate the results of research into products Deploy models to tools in production Develop communication and interaction patterns for effective technical work Leverage the possibility to lead special interest groups within R&D Build and maintain an index of relevant problems and solvers in R&D Conduct intelligence on state-of-the-art academic papers Monitor cutting-edge industrial products * 与组长合作，共同完善和解答属于你的问题陈述，包括把问题陈述形式化表达、跟踪问题陈述的进展、识别变量、构建模型和开发解决方案 * 自定义现有算法或开发新算法，以满足项目需求 * 参与机器学习开发的整个流程，包括训练数据收集，特征工程，模型训练，离线和在线实验 * 与研发团队协作，将需求转化成问题陈述，将解决方案转化成产品 * 跟进团队对于特定产品的进展 * 将研究成果整合到产品中 * 将模型部署到生产流程的工具中 * 为了高效的技术工作，提高沟通交流能力 * 锻炼主持部门内部特定兴趣小组的能力 * 构建和维护团队关于相关问题和解法的索引 * 持续跟进学术界最新的相关成果 * 持续跟进行业内最新的相关产品 任职条件: MS or PhD in computer science or related majors Knowledge and experience about machine learning Extensive experience in one major programming language (Python, C, C++, C#, Lua…) Curiosity, capacity for independent thought Good problem analysis and solving ability, have a sense of teamwork Familiarity with APIs for Data Science and Machine Learning (e.g. Tensorflor or PyTorch) Familiarity with APIs for Game Development and 3D Computer Graphics (e.g. Unreal or Maya) MS或PhD计算机科学或相关领域学历 * 机器学习相关的知识和经验 * 在一种主要编程语言（Python, C, C++, C#, Lua…）方面拥有丰富经验 * 具有良好的问题分析和解决能力，具备团队合作意识 * 好奇心和独立思考的能力 * 熟悉用于数据科学和机器学习的API（如TensorFlow或PyTorch） * 熟悉用于游戏开发和3D计算机图形学的API（如Unreal或Maya）

Title: Data Topic - ETL / PowerBI/ Tableau/ Machine Learning Engineer- Global Delivery Center - Dalian
Description: Pursue a Career with Impact  At Deloitte China, we are on a mission to nurture and empower our people to become deep subject matter experts. We offer the perfect platform to unleash your full potential and equip you to thrive on challenges, and partner with our clients to solve their most complex problems. A world of opportunities awaits. Start your adventure and journey with us.    About Consulting     About the Business    Deloitte Consulting is the world's largest management consulting practice. In China we are one of the top consulting firms. Our team comprises around 1,600 bilingual consulting talents located in eight cities in China including Shanghai, Beijing, Hong Kong, Shenzhen, Guangzhou, Cheng Du, Chong Qing and Harbin. In global, we have over 44,000 professionals spreading in over 100 countries/locations. Deloitte Consulting is ranked No.1 in global consulting marketplace by revenue by Kennedy, a leading publisher of consulting marketplace analysis products. In China, Deloitte Consulting is ranked as one of the top 3 consulting service providers by Gartner, a global leading IT research and advisory company. Deloitte consulting is awarded as "the Best HR Consulting Firm".    Work you'll do    技能要求：   Tableau ，数据分析， BI   1 、负责项目中 BI 分析系统运维及开发工作，搭建数据分析模型，为制定运营策略和产品迭代提供数据依据   2 、负责报表层数据表结构设计、建模、开发等；负责前端报表和 BI 的设计、开发和维护   3 、负责通过系统后台的数据进行数据核验、抽取、报送等技术支撑工作，确保数据的准确性与及时性   4 、负责配合业务部门完成数据治理、数据清洗等工作，制定数据管理与治理机制，研究构建数据管理体系   5 、负责公司数据可视化平台的搭建，参与数据产品的开发，促进数据产品的优化。    A fit for the role? Let's talk about you.    岗位要求   1 、本科以上学历，计算机、统计学、管理科学相关专业， 1 年以上工作经验，长期参与 BI 开发项目的相关经验者优先   2 、熟悉主流 BI 分析工具 Tableau 、 power BI 、帆软 BI 、 smart BI 、 qlik Sense 、 microstrategy 、 OBIEE 。   3 、数据库如 Oracle 、 Mysql 、 SqlServer 、 greenplum 等，熟练掌握 SQL 语句；熟悉 hadoop 相关组件，包括 mapreduce 、 hdfs 、 hive 、 hbase 、 zookeeper 、 sqoop 、 mango DB 等。   4 、理解 DW/BI 相关的知识，包括 ETL 、数据仓库、 OLAP 、多维数据模型（ SSAS ）等   5 、熟悉 SPSS 、 SAS 模型，熟悉 python 、 r 等语言做数据分析；   6 、对算法（线性回归、分类、聚类）有实际应用能力，能根据业务需求应用合适算法。   7 、对数据敏感，有很强的逻辑思维能力和分析能力，善于沟通。   8 、责任心强、重视团队合作，具有良好的项目推动、沟通协调能力，思维敏捷，具有挑战精神。   9 、英文流利沟通优   注： 2/3/4/5/6  ，符合三项即可  Why Deloitte China?  Deloitte China delivers a comprehensive range of audit & assurance, consulting, financial advisory, risk advisory and tax services to local, multinational and growth enterprise clients in China.   We are the world's largest professional services firmthat changes the world, we lead with purpose and shared values.  We are the market leader with digital and innovative solutions, we create values for client through our multi-disciplinary services.  We are recognized as Top Employerin China by the Top Employers Institute* for 14th consecutive years, and made the top 3 for the first time this year!  We are certified as one of the ‘Best Workplaces™in Greater China by Great Place to Work® in 2019

Title: Process Engineer
Description: This job will provide you with an opportunity to further your career alongside some of the best and most passionate technology experts from around the world in a leading company within the test, measurement and data analytics industry. You will be a strong contributor collaborating closely with colleagues from various business functions.   At HBK, we live up to our three values: Be True, Own It and Aim High. We believe in absolute integrity – it’s how we win for stakeholders, the environment and each other. We believe in teamwork and keeping our promises – to ourselves and others. Finally, we believe in being bold and positive. This is how we perform at our best and achieve greater success.    Professional Qualifications    University degree in mechanical/material or related. 3+ years of work experience in process/manufacturing engineering or related, work experience in load cell will be preferred. Lean production experience (VSM, PDCA, etc.). Fluent in oral and written English will be preferred. Be True, Own It, Aim High.    Personal Skills    Self-motivation, good team player and good communication skill. Excellent IT knowledge (Microsoft® Office, SAP, etc.). Strong in data analysis based on Minitable.

Title: Engineer
Description: We offer opportunities for you to expand your engineering or scientific knowledge amidst experts with degrees from top programs at over 500 universities. At Exponent, you will apply your experience, technical skills, and prior academic research to a fulfilling career in consulting. You will have the opportunity to develop continuously through formal and informal development programs, coaching and mentoring, and involvement in a wide array of projects. We are excited about your interest in joining our growing team!   Key statistics:   1100+ Team members 900+ Consultants 550+ Ph.D.s 30+ Offices globally    We are currently seeking an Engineer  for our Sciences  Practice in Shanghai, China. In this role, you will work as part of a team to apply the principles of thermal sciences to a wide variety of technical problems. Must be willing to travel, as needed, to project sites. This position requires relocation to China.   You will be responsible for:   Developing test plans, instrumenting, and carrying out laboratory experiments including testing on batteries and battery systems across multiple business sectors Performing engineering calculations and analysis Preparing proposals and technical reports, and presenting findings to clients Traveling with senior staff to client sites Analyzing the failure of a wide variety of products via field inspections, laboratory testing, and engineering analysis Providing failure prevention services Project management and marketing Communicating with clients in the U.S. and Asia    You will have the following skills and qualifications:   Written and verbal fluency in English is required, and verbal fluency in Mandarin Chinese is preferred Ph.D. in Chemical, Mechanical, Aerospace, or Fire Protection Engineering Excellent hands-on engineering experience with strong skills in laboratory methods including construction of experimental apparatus, instrumentation, data acquisition, and data analysis Strong technical background in the thermal sciences and including battery systems, vent gas and fire propagation, fluid mechanics, and heat transfer Experience with battery systems is a plus Demonstrated leadership skills and proven ability to work in a multidisciplinary environment Ability to clearly communicate findings through reports and presentations Must be detail-oriented and self-motivated requiring minimal supervision Strong organizational, teamwork, and management skills    To learn more about life at Exponent and our impact, please visit the following links:   We value and encourage diversity, equity and inclusion across all facets of our firm. Having a team built of people with different backgrounds, skills and perspectives allows us to provide better value to our clients and enjoy an enriched work environment.   Our firm is committed to offering a variety of programs and resources to support health and well-being. We believe that providing competitive benefits as well as compensation and recognition programs empowers our staff to do work that makes a difference.   Exponent is a proud equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, veteran status, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, or any other protected status.   If you need assistance or accommodation due to a disability, you may email us at

Title: Data Collector for Color Neutralization
Description: Are you creative, have a passion for photography, and want to work for a leading technology provider and help train a machine learning model for automatic color neutralization?    We are looking for individuals with specific camera equipment who may be professional, semi-professional, or avid enthusiasts/ hobbyists who can understand and set specific camera operations. You will be taking videos with a variety of lighting conditions, and different backgrounds and will be of people and/or pets performing specific activities as outlined.     Requirements:   Must have one or more of the following types of hardware and specific device models to be used for video captures: Currently residing in China     * Mirrorless/ DSLR cameras  Sony rx100 V OR Sony ZV-1 | Capture format: LOG, HLG  Sony A7S III | Capture format: Log (S-Log3-Cine), HLG  Canon EOS R5 | Capture format: Log (Canon-log-3), HDR PQ (All I)  Panasonic GH5S | Capture format: Log (Panasonic vlog), HLG internal, ProRes HQ (with Atomos Ninja 5)  Fujifilm X-T3 or X-T4 | Capture format: Log (F-Log), HLG  Nikon Z6 or Z7 | Capture format: Log (N-Log) & ProRes Raw (with Atomos Ninja 5)     * Action cameras  DJI OSMO Action 4K or DJI Pocket 2 | Capture format: HDR  GoPro HERO8 Black | Capture format: HEVC (H. 265), standard H. 264 (AVC)     * Drones  Any DJI model | Capture format: 4K HDR     * Atomos recorder  Any model | Capture format: ProResRAW     How to Apply?    1. Access the link below to register or click the "APPLY" button.      https://connect.appen.com/qrp/public/home?sref=8871faf4fa8a7a573f0433a6c3c7188d     2. Choose Englishas your primary language and Chinaas your country of residence.    3. Once you complete the registration process, you will be able to receive feedback via email or direct through the Appen Connect platform. If you are also interested in applying for other projects, make sure that you complete your profile by clicking the "UNLOCK" button so you can unlock more projects for your account.    4. Look for the project and start applying.    Don’t miss the chance to earn extra income working from the comfort of your own home. This is a great opportunity for you and your friends!     Watch this instructional video to successfully create your profile:     https://crowdsupport.appen.com/hc/en-us/articles/4408022443156-How-do-I-create-a-profile-in-Appen-Connect-VIDEO-        A diverse, inclusive culture is vital to our mission of helping build better AI. We offer opportunities for individuals of all abilities and backgrounds.

Title: Applications Engineer
Description: Onto Innovation is a leader in process control, combining global scale with an expanded portfolio of leading-edge technologies that include: 3D metrology spanning the chip from nanometer-scale transistors to micron-level die-interconnects; macro defect inspection of wafers and packages; metal interconnect composition; factory analytics; and lithography for advanced semiconductor packaging. Our breadth of offerings across the entire semiconductor value chain helps our customers solve their most difficult yield, device performance, quality, and reliability issues. Onto Innovation strives to optimize customers’ critical path of progress by making them smarter, faster and more efficient.    Primary Responsibilities    Job Summary & Responsibilities   Responsible for supporting Tool Centric and Fab Wide support of Discover DMS & YMS , Discover True ADC, Discover Review, by assisting the sales team, driving the product roadmap, and working on customer projects. Participate actively in presales demo, Statement of Work definition. Work closely with the local development teams in the US/CN on design and implementation of new features for Onto’s Software product. Assist customers with performing data analysis and finding/documenting the value of our products. Provide written and oral feedback to the customer on applications work including troubleshooting, Model development, and installation procedures. Provide technical assistance within areas of specialty for customers. Participate in white paper / seminars related. Approximately 50% travel will be required, including both international and domestic locations    Key Qualifications    Qualifications   Bachelor's of Science or engineering degree in any discipline. Minimum of three years of direct semiconductor experience in a fab environment is a must. Basic knowledge of wafer manufacturing process is a must. Knowledge of Classification strategies and analysis techniques and experience with a variety of semiconductor manufacturing process tools is a plus but not required Semiconductor Fab experience strongly preferred. Factory automation knowledge is a plus but not required. Systematic approach towards problem solving. Effective time management: Adherence to schedule and prioritization. Ownership. Minimal supervision required, stays on top assignments. Continuous improvement mindset and knowledge of continuous improvement techniques such as 5s, Lean Manufacturing, Six Sigma. Drive for skills continuous improvement Team player, be able to team up with all departments and/or individuals. Able to guide/mentor other team members on best maintenance practices, toolset expertise, etc.    Minimum Requirements    3-15 years’ experience working in semiconductor manufacturing industry preferably in relevant areas (Defect or Yield ). Highly driven, self-sufficient, well organized Good interpersonal skills Willingness to travel >50% Experience with software systems and methodology commonly used in inspection/metrology such as defect management systems, yield management systems, statistical process control, tool matching methodology, etc. is a plus. Good knowledge of semiconductor manufacturing processes proven through similar application support or process module engineering roles University degree (B.Sc., M.Sc,, PhD or similar) in a relevant technical field (physics, chemistry, engineering, etc.) Strong presentation and communication skills Strong Microsoft Office product knowledge   Onto Innovation is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an equal-opportunity employer. We offer competitive salaries and a generous benefits package, including health/dental/vision/life/disability, PTO, 401K plan with employer match, and an Employee Stock Ownership Program (ESOP) along with health & wellness initiatives.   We provide a collaborative working environment along with resources, and state-of-the-art tools & equipment to promote success; and a welcoming, inclusive corporate culture where individuals are recognized for their contributions.

Title: 计划分析员
Description: 上海迪士尼度假区正在寻求拥有运用技术、统计和分析技能的优秀人才，负责为公司制定并保持高效、准确的人员配置计划。工作内容包括前期预测、工作量分析以及专项分析并且与业务线领导团队、工业工程、财务、招聘和其他相关团队保持合作，以确定和实施具有创造性的解决方案，以满足游客需求和实现财务目标。  您将作为您所支持的业务线和其他内部合作团队的劳动力战略规划合作伙伴，负责短期或长期一线劳动力的预测、规划、跟踪和审计； 您将与运营管理团队、工业工程和财务部门合作，确定并改进人力部署模型（包括但不限于交易预测），实现年度运营规划人力与运营需求和服务标准的平衡，以确保卓越的游客服务； 与各业务线运营经理、排班和招聘团队合作，实现合理的人力配置： 您将参与人力需求的持续预测并向业务线运营管理团队提供预测结果，在乐园旺季之前提供有关人员配置预测的最新信息；  您将准备培训计划并与排班经理合作将其实施，以确保为演职人员的职业发展提供培训和机会；  您将保持与招聘团队的合作以监控招聘进度、招聘预测并及时解决任何可能出现的异常情况；  您将持续与排班经理合作，以了解并解决任何人员配备方面的挑战。  您将通过运行各种预测模型、检验人力使用情况、分析趋势和优化方案，确保每周准确、及时地将人力和特别活动需求交接给排班员； 您将根据需要提供预测、变更影响和临时工时分析； 您将按照公司需求为劳动力管理的优化和项目的制定与实施提供支持。   您将作为您所支持的业务线和其他内部合作团队的劳动力战略规划合作伙伴，负责短期或长期一线劳动力的预测、规划、跟踪和审计； 您将与运营管理团队、工业工程和财务部门合作，确定并改进人力部署模型（包括但不限于交易预测），实现年度运营规划人力与运营需求和服务标准的平衡，以确保卓越的游客服务； 与各业务线运营经理、排班和招聘团队合作，实现合理的人力配置： 您将参与人力需求的持续预测并向业务线运营管理团队提供预测结果，在乐园旺季之前提供有关人员配置预测的最新信息；  您将准备培训计划并与排班经理合作将其实施，以确保为演职人员的职业发展提供培训和机会；  您将保持与招聘团队的合作以监控招聘进度、招聘预测并及时解决任何可能出现的异常情况；  您将持续与排班经理合作，以了解并解决任何人员配备方面的挑战。  您将通过运行各种预测模型、检验人力使用情况、分析趋势和优化方案，确保每周准确、及时地将人力和特别活动需求交接给排班员； 您将根据需要提供预测、变更影响和临时工时分析； 您将按照公司需求为劳动力管理的优化和项目的制定与实施提供支持。  Responsibilities :我们采取积极负责的方法与行动创造环境，以让我们能够尽可能地发挥我们的所长——那就是每一年为数百万来自全国和世界各地的游客打造神奇的游玩体验。作为对健康和安全承诺的一部分，我们要求所有新员工在入职前完成新冠疫苗的接种。   postingchannel:wechat   Keyword: SHDRprofessional    Basic Qualifications    拥有定向分析相关专业本科或同等学历，并拥有2至3年相关研究领域的工作经验； 拥有优秀的中英双语口头沟通和书写技巧； 注重细节并且能高效地完成任务，支持变革并持续改进； 具有处理机密信息的能力，拥有良好的项目管理技能和团队合作经验； 具备建立和维护客户关系的能力并具有服务意识，能够理解劳动力管理和（或）工业工程的原理； 能够适应灵活的工作安排，包括周末和节假日； 熟练使用 Microsoft Excel，精通 SQL 和 VB 或 VBA者优先； 拥有优秀的解决问题和时间管理能力者优先； 对工作保持热情并且能使用技术解决业务需求者优先。    Preferred Education    拥有定向分析相关专业本科或同等学历，并拥有2至3年相关研究领域的工作经验； 拥有优秀的中英双语口头沟通和书写技巧； 注重细节并且能高效地完成任务，支持变革并持续改进； 具有处理机密信息的能力，拥有良好的项目管理技能和团队合作经验； 具备建立和维护客户关系的能力并具有服务意识，能够理解劳动力管理和（或）工业工程的原理； 能够适应灵活的工作安排，包括周末和节假日； 熟练使用 Microsoft Excel，精通 SQL 和 VB 或 VBA者优先； 拥有优秀的解决问题和时间管理能力者优先； 对工作保持热情并且能使用技术解决业务需求者优先。
